text: Search this rubble.
Find me something good, you dogs!

If you're here, then it means you are prepared to begin the study of summoning demonic cohorts to do your bidding. We will start with the lowliest creatures you will be able to call and continue from there. Let us begin.
The easiest creature for you to summon is the imp. You should already be able to bring forth this minion but for completeness' sake I will start with him.
This foul little beast is the imp. It is small and weak, making it almost useless as a meatshield, and its damage output is mediocre at best. This creature is best used for support of a larger group.
Now that you have had a chance to study the imp, let us move on to the next minion you will be able to summon, the voidwalker.

This demonic entity is known as the Voidwalker. Its strength and endurance are significant, making it ideal for defense. Send it to attack your enemy, then use it as a shield while you use your spells and abilities to drain away your opponent's life.

If you've never seen one, it is a sight to behold. A very impressive creature both on and off the field of battle. Next, let us take a look at what I am sure all you male students have been waiting for. The succubus.

All right now. Aside from the obvious distractions a minion like this will provide against your more masculine foes, she is also capable of dealing out impressive amounts of damage. However, her fragile endurance makes her almost useless as a shield.
Study hard and you might one day be able to summon one on your own, but for now it's time to move on to the felhunter.
What you see before you is a felhunter. This creature's natural talents include spell lock and other abilities which make it unequalled when facing a magically attuned opponent.

When facing a spellcaster of any kind, this feral beast will be your best friend. Now, let us take a look at something a bit different. This next creature will aid your travels and make your future journeys much easier. Let's take a look at a felsteed.

I doubt you have had much occasion to see such a creature. These demonic equines will make your travels much faster by acting as your mount as long as you control them. However, they are difficult to control, so be sure you are ready before attempting it.
There you have it. Our lesson on summoning has come to an end. A new class will begin shortly, so if you wish to brush up, feel free to stay around.
I've been saving this spot for something special. I don't think it gets any more special than this, $N.
I am looking for some bodyguards that would like to protect the Gizelton Caravan. We are stopped on the road east of Kormek's Hut, north of Kolkar Centaur Village.
There we go. All done!
So sorry to leave a customer but we have places to go and people to swindle. We will be back sometime later today. Good-bye!
Hulfnar!  Thontek!  Stand and address me.
I want you both to demonstrate the techniques I have taught you for the benefit of the younger students here.  Ready...  begin!
Enough talk you two!  Commence fighting!
Ish nu!  That's enough!
Good, good.  Now bow to each other.
Now bow to me.
Good job you two.  Now go have a seat.
Now that's a War Stomp!  Good job!
Start running!
Bring it on!
Do not push me, or I will impale you on my horns!
You hold my father's blade, $N. My soldiers are yours to control, my $g Lord:Lady;. Take them... Lead them... The impure must be purged. They must be cleansed of their taint.
Very interesting!
This doesn't look good!
I dunno. What do you want to do?
Fishing sounds good.
I'm out of here!
Well done!
That one, Malagan. I know $g him:her;. Dependable, brave, and trustworthy. $N is $g his:her; name.
$N, eh? Oy! Citizen $N, come 'ere. Highlord Bolvar Fordragon has requested that all able bodied heroes o' the Alliance meet with him at Stormwind Keep. You just been recruited, mate! Get a move on!
Ha! Now your death is ensured!
You dare! Now feel my wrath!
Edward. Tyler. Prepare for your first challenge.
Lysta, summon in the captives.
Not a challenge at all it seems. Let us see how you handle your second test. Lysta, bring forth the minions of the Lich King.
Lysta, summon in undead captives.
It is time to face your final challenge young warriors! Prepare for your hardest fight yet.
Lysta, summon forth... the abomination!
Well done Edward and Tyler. You are progressing along in your training quite nicely. We shall test your mettle again soon.
Ugh! What is that scoundrel doing sending his vermin to me? Get out of my sight before I take what is left of your life. And take this with you.
Theresa, take this to Father Lankester.
Why thank you, my pet.
Oh, great.
I hope this works!
Look at them go!
Kroshius live? Kroshius crush!
Niby, you are stupid.
This is it, Impsy. I can feel it! This is the big one!
When the time is right, my lady. All will be clear when the time is right. The master stirs even now. Look to the skies for the Brood of Nozdormu have returned.
NO!
THIS CANNOT BE!!
Grumble...
Why you little!
Ack! Help! Crazed gnome trying to kill me!
ARRRRRGH! He got me!
He's mine...
My sword Archeus served me well in life, but as at last my spirit may pass from the unhappy existence, I need it no longer.
I shall cling to the love of my daughter and hope that I will find forgiveness under the Light for my sins.
Watch, druid. The earth still breathes. It yearns to be cleansed.
That is wonderous, Rimblat! Even this foul, sundered earth is not beyond healing.
The race will start in 1 minute!
And they're off!
Your discs are now ready!  Engage the Discs of Norgannon once again to retrieve them!
I SAID GOOD DAY!

Hey, who Fengus callin' a gnoll lover?!  Take da prisoners to da king; you smart to bring them with their weapons and show da king that they a threat.  I'll go see if Fengus talk smack when I give him da beatdown!  HAR!
The enemy is upon us, stand ready!
Merok!  Shai!  To my side!
Wait!  It appears our lookout has spotted something.
Soldier, call Captain Blackanvil at once!
Look alive, lads!  The enemy has been sighted!  Form ranks immediately!
Read through my catalogue, $N.
Come, my acolytes. Take the rods of channeling and create the greater summoning circle.
The Frostwolf Graveyard was taken by the Horde!
The Stormpike Graveyard was taken by the Alliance!
Still no sign of the final shipment of explosives.

The Fanglords are dead! All hope is not lost!$b$bThe awakening ritual is quite complex, however. It cannot be done alone.$b$bI will handle all of the necessary preparations but I will need you to protect me. The nightmares summoned from Naralex's journey through the Emerald Dream prove to be quite formidable. Without your help, this mission is doomed.$b$bWhen you are ready to defend me, say the word, and I shall lead the way to Naralex's chamber.
Rest your weary bones for a spell.

I am unable to process your chronological reference in comparison to the recording of this data, my apologies.$B$BThe trogg retains some composition of Azeroth's various stone core compounds, but the loss of cognitive power makes this variant unacceptable to the Creators.$B$BThe trogg procreates as per a standard biomass.  By default it consumes stone and anything else it can acquire, including other troggs.  Cannibalism is considered unacceptable by the Creators.

Initiating visual aid representation number two.$B$BThe second resultant variance of the Earthen matrix retains many desired elements when compared to the standard subterranean matrix.  The common nomenclature for this variant is "Dwarf".$B$BThis variant retains strength and stamina inherent to the Earthen.  In some cases, the dwarf even exceeds the cognitive powers of the Earthen's matrix.  The dwarf, however, retains none of the physical composition of Azeroth's various stone core compounds.

The data stored in this repository does indeed correlate with your astute proclamation.$B$BThe dwarf maintains an affinity for the stone composition of Azeroth, but due to the high-stress environmental anomaly within the Earthen's synthesis matrix, the dwarf reverts to a default biomass composition as seen in the standard subterranean matrix.$B$BErgo, the dwarf variant does synthesize from the degeneration of the Earthen creation matrix, as you inferred with your query.

I am unable to process your chronological reference in comparison to the recording of this data, my apologies.$B$BThough the dwarf maintains most of the Earthen's mental attunement to Azeroth's stone composition, the reversion back into living biomass remains the main degeneration of the matrix.  Dwarves eat and procreate through means typical to other standard biomasses.$B$BThe Creators view the dwarf as an acceptable variant, worthy of genesis in its own right.

The Creators are... the Creators.$B$BThey are the beings that seeded and shaped this world by their own design.  They are the reason for this world's existence, as well as many other worlds.  They are the wellspring from which Azeroth flows.

The Creators are cognizant of the magnitude of the information housed in this repository.  Subsequently, a portable copy of the data stored here will be made available to you once you are attuned with the Discs of Norgannon.$B$BPlease consider your cursory requirements for the assimilation of this knowledge to be complete.  At your leisure, access the Discs of Norgannon to begin synthesis of your discs.
So ye want to be a Blacksmith eh? Grab an apron and a hammer $g lad : lass;, let's see what ye've got.
I hope ye didn't come all the way to the Great Forge just to stay warm. Speak up $g lad : lass;, tell me what it is I can do for ye?
Welcome to Stormwind. Took a long time to rebuild her but it was well worth it. So are you visiting, or are you here on business?
I sell only the finest arcane gear, made by the crafters and mages here in the city of Stormwind.

Since the fall of Dalaran and the destruction of Quel'Thalas, wares of this sort have been hard to come by. But Lucan Cordell and some of our other Tradesman have been doing a fine job of filling our orders with quality merchandise.
Just browsing my wares or is there something specific I can help you find today?
Best deals in all of Stormwind my friend, won't find any better. Now, what can I help you with?
I sell only the best gear, tested and true. And the prices are set, so if you want to haggle then go find a Goblin.
What is it you seek at my forge? Is it training? Do you perhaps seek the secrets of steel? The mysteries of the forge? Speak up Grunt!

You have the look of a $g man : woman; who seeks knowledge. Perhaps you seek the teachings of the forge, and the hammer. Perhaps I can guide you down that path. But only once you have accepted the spirits, and listened to their calling.
Want to be a smith? Want to forge blades to gut your foe? Hammers to crush his skull? Aye I can help, and gladly too if there is blood to be shed from it.

Greetings, $N. I see you've come from Orgrimmar to aid us. I'm glad. I want to be out of this forsaken forest as quickly as possible. I'd much rather be spending my time in Orgrimmar with a good ale.$B$BAlthough I cannot wait to hear how Belgrom talked you into coming out here.
The arcane only corrupts those who are weak. Keep up on your training, or you may find a similar fate.
Um, hello!  If you are here about fee collection and/or a summons, then you must have me mistaken for someone else.  Terribly sorry!
Cherry pie is my favoritist food in all of Azeroth.
Fresh cherry pie for sale, looks so good it will bring a tear to your eye.
Try some of this cherry pie, it will put a smile on your face, ten miles wide.
This cherry pie tastes so good, it could make a grown gnome cry.
Having a bad day? Try some cherry pie.
This pie is so good, would you like some?
Nana always said there was no greater thing in the whole world than a warm, toasty slice of fresh, homemeade cherry pie.
I love pie.
I think I hear him coming!  Look to the west!
Hello, $n. If you'd like to learn a thing or two about cooking, please visit me at any time.

Finally! Put some fingers in your ears, your brain mighta just grown five sizes and I'm worried it might leak out.$B$BSo, the Dark Irons spared his life and took him prisoner. Their leader, some self-important, uppity fella named Thauris-something, took Ironfoe for himself. And that was the last I saw of ol' Windsor... *hic* 'scuse me.

$G Mister:Missy;, if I didn't know better, I'd think you were one of them 'special' peoples. We call em Troggs.$B$BWindsor didn't have no beef with the Dark Irons, after all, his great, great, grand pappy's best friend was a Dark Iron. Which is also probably why that army of Dark Irons didn't kill him on sight.
Good idea!
My master, Plugger Spazzring, is a good boss.  And he makes a lot of money.  His pockets are bursting!
Be sure to try our Dark Iron Ale.  I hear the dwarves around here can't get enough of it.
Welcome to the Grim Guzzler!
Of all the wondrous places within Darnassus, which would you have me direct you to?

Why you would want to leave these sunny shores and crystal blue waters I have no idea. It's like paradise down here. But don't tell my brother Zapetta that, he's bitter enough already about getting stuck up there in Tirisfal all day long. This Zeppelin here drops off at Orgrimmar so you shouldn't have to worry about having to listen to him whine. But if you are in Tirisfal anytime soon, heed my warning and don't get him started.

Lady Sylvanas has ordered the investigation of some of the natural phenomena of Azeroth. She feels there is something great to be learned from its secretive past.$B$BI know not how she learned such things, but I trust her completely, so I will do my best.$B$BI am currently investigating slimes, oozes and such. The creatures all seem to be similar in make up, but greatly affected by their environment.$B$BI could use your help in gathering samples of the creatures..
With pleasure... just let me savor this moment for a minute longer.
Wanna buy a cockroach?
I am Krathok, overseer of these craftsmen.
The Scourge's plague still dominates the zone, and we have a long way to go before the plague will be altered enough to affect them.  Collect the necessary resources and help out the war effort!
I hope the Light is with you, $N. Is there anything I can do for you today?

Slip a little coin into the boss's hand and look what it gets ya. I love my job. Though, if I could find a way to get that little firecracker Snurk reassigned to this port....well, I can't imagine it any better. But I'm betting that you aren't here about my business practices. You're looking for the Zeppelin to Undercity, am I right? Well that's great, because it docks right here behind me. Oh and hey, if you see Snurk, put a good word in for me, would ya?
Hey mon, you be needin' to head on over to da $c trainer.
When I clawed my way out of the grave, I thought my family would welcome me with open arms. Instead, they drove me from the village, screaming in a language I could no longer understand.
How may I be of service?
If you ask me, there's no greater profession than a miner.  And if you ask me, there's no greater miner than a dwarf!
Do not turn your back on the Light, $c, it may be the one thing that saves you some day.
Stormwind is the pillar of the human race, maintained through strength of will and the edge of a sturdy blade.
The darkness does not embrace you, $c.  Cease your prattle and remove yourself from my sight!  Be gone!
Elune be with you, $c.
$N, how may I further your training in the eyes of the Earth Mother?
The Light protect you, $c.
Well met, $c.  You want some advice?  Befriend a mage!  We have a trick or two up our sleeves, we do...

Welcome, my $g brother : sister;.  If you are here to train, then I would be delighted to train you.$B$BWe are the preservers of the balance, now and forever, as Malfurion lies in the Dreaming.  Never forget this.
I do not see the warrior's spirit within you, child.  I have no teachings which would benefit a $c such as yourself.
Your skill exceeds mine, though  I've heard that Old Man Heming in Booty Bay has copies of "The Bass and You".  That is sure to help you increase your skill.
I am an orc of medicine, $r. If you have come here to learn, I shall do my best to teach.
I need many more supplies in order to upgrade our units.
You will need to find Nat Pagle in Dustwallow Marsh to get any better than you are currently.
I hold the key to lands of free! Chase me and you'll see!
Still alive? You do surprise. Watch me as I flee!
Turn that frown upside down!
This is the end of the line, no friend of mine!
Gaze upon the enemy, $r. See what the might of the Horde reduces even the most powerful of dragons to! All that oppose us shall meet a similar fate!
Perhaps one day, your contributions to the Alliance will be as great as the heroes you have seen this day. Honor them, $N.
I can teach you how to cook!
Look to this fallen dragon, $r. The might of the Horde is unquestionable!
The Lord of Blackrock hangs from the arches!

Alas... I am sorry to say I cannot currently give you your fortune, as you have recently received a fortune reading from me.$B$BReturn to me several hours from when you first received your fortune.  The forces of Fate will have properly recalibrated themselves, and I will be able to see into your future.

The Paragons of Power are remnants from the ancient Gurubashi Empire.  We Zandalar seek them - not only are they of tremendous collectible value to us, but we believe that they also hold latent signatures of magic used by the old Empire.$B$BYou'll more than likely discover three kinds of Paragons in Zul'Gurub: coins, bijous, and primal items.  Bring them to us in the quantities that we seek, and you'll be rewarded with some of the finest items we Zandalar have ever crafted.

The Paragons of Power are remnants from the ancient Gurubashi Empire.  We Zandalar seek them - not only are they of tremendous collectible value to us, but we believe that they also hold the strongest of mojo used by the old Empire.$B$BYa can expect to be findin' three kinds of Paragons in Zul'Gurub: coins, bijous, and primal items.  Bring them to us in the quantities that we seek, and you'll be rewarded with the some of the finest items we Zandalar have ever crafted.$B$BCount on it, mon!
I'm afraid ye would not survive long in Alterac Valley, $c.  Come back and see us when you have a few more seasons under your belt.

$N, the Stormpike Guard is in need of your aid in the battle against the Frostwolf Clan in Alterac Valley, now more than ever.  The opportunities for honor and repute are greater than ever as well! Will you join the battle?
Thank you for the offer, $c.  Unfortunately you are not yet experienced enough to weather the hazards of Arathi Basin.

Paragons of Power are powerful mojo.  They are Gurubashi Empire mojo.  We Zandalar must get mojo.  The tribe will take mojo for our own.  The Blood God will not destroy us.$B$BThere are three kinds of Paragons in Zul'Gurub.  Seek coins.  Seek bijous.  Seek primal items.  These are the Paragons.$B$BGo to Zul'Gurub now.  Kill.  Take the Paragons of Power.  Bring them to the tribe.  Earn our respect.  Earn our battle gear.  Earn real power.
Where would you like to fly to?
The silithid are no match for the sons and daughters of Orgrimmar.  Soon all that will be left of them are their crushed limbs and wings under our feet, $N.
The world is indebted to you and your allies, $N.
All will know of what has transpired here in this accursed temple, hero. It will be written about in history books - the tales told as legend from Azeroth to the far reaches of the Nether itself!
That was quite a fight.  Let us catch our breath for a bit.
It looks like you've already found love. You can give me a love token, but I'm not giving you anything nice. I'm waiting for someone special.
I'd like you better if you would apply some perfume.
I'd talk to you if you smelled better. Cologne would be nice.
My mission is compete. I may have some spare supplies if you need any.
I am unable to teach a Tauren to ride a Skeletal Mount.  I am sorry but there is nothing I can do for you.

I have tracked the various fragments of the staff across this world and in doing so, discovered Kel'Thuzad's plans to reform the staff. He has already collected several of the staff's fragments - which are being held by his most trusted lieutenants.$B$BI cannot emphasize enough the importance of keeping the greatstaff of the Guardian out of Kel'Thuzad's grasp. Frankly, I do not know what the result would be, other than a catastrophe of epic proportion.

<Tarsis's eyes light up.>$B$BI held it once... I held it despite the warnings of the Kirin Tor. I held it, mortal... Power unending. Power to do what I desired, as I desired. And just as quickly, it was taken from me. But I had tasted... And that taste was all that it took.
Atiesh, Greatstaff of the Guardian. The staff handed down through the ages to each of the Guardians of Tirisfal. The staff corrupted by Sargeras. The staff of the last Guardian. The staff of Medivh.

<Tarsis grabs you weakly by the collar. Even in death you see power unimaginable in his eyes.>$B$BAm I? Then listen closely, for more nonsense is about to escape my lips. Within this citadel you will find my life's work: The exact location of every fragment of the splintered staff.
I would have it back, mortal. Atiesh... From it I would create the Highborne anew. I would have it all back. Even the Queen...
I am Highborne, $r. It has no meaning now. There was a time, though, when this world was ruled by Highborne. Ten thousand years past...
The things I have done... such horrible things...$B$B<Tarsis begins to sob.>

<Tarsis groans.>$B$BThere may still be time... Listen closely, mortal.$B$BThrough time and across the Nether I have searched. Deals made with a host of evil and villainy so wretched...$B$B<Tarsis coughs blood into his hands.>$B$BWould you... would you believe that even Elune has turned her back on me, $r? To die here, in this manner now...

Haven't you been listening? No, I very much doubt we would be having this conversation had Kel'Thuzad formed the staff. Kel'Thuzad holds the head. His underlings hold forty splinters of Atiesh. The last piece - the base - was uncovered by Brann Bronzebeard. He was last seen in the Silithus desert; undoubtedly doing his best to stay as far away as possible from the relentless seekers Kel'Thuzad has dispatched into the world.

Kel'Thuzad has put forth considerable effort in attempting to reform the staff. The pieces were once scattered across this world, from Kalimdor to the South Seas. I myself held twenty of the pieces at one point in time - until they were stolen from me by Kel'Thuzad's minions. It is why I am here.
It was lost when the Violet Citadel fell... splintered into forty-two pieces.

I'm afraid that the blade which you hold in your hands is beyond saving. The hatred runs too deep. But do not lose hope, $c. Where one chapter has ended, a new one begins.$B$BFind his son - a more devout and pious man you may never meet. It is rumored that he is able to build the Ashbringer anew, without requiring the old, tainted blade.

Aye, I did. Much to the dismay of the lesser Mograine, I made my way back to the Scarlet Monastery. I shouted and screamed. I told the tale to any that would listen. And I would be murdered in cold blood for my actions, dragged to this chamber - the dark secret of the order. But some did listen... some heard my words. Thus was born the Argent Dawn...

The blade and Mograine were a singular entity. Do you understand? This act corrupted the blade and lead to Mograine's own corruption as a death knight of Kel'Thuzad. I swore that if I lived, I would expose the perpetrators of this heinous crime. For two days I remained under the rot and contagion of Scourge - gathering as much strength as possible to escape the razed city.
The boy had picked up the Ashbringer and driven it through his father's heart as his back was turned. His last words will haunt me forever: "What have you done, Renault? Why would you do this?"

It was all I could do to feign death as the corpses of the Scourge piled upon me. There was darkness and only the muffled sounds of the battle above me. The clashing of iron, the gnashing and grinding... gruesome, terrible sounds. And then there was silence. He called to me! "Fairbanks! Fairbanks where are you? Talk to me Fairbanks!" And then came the sound of incredulousness. The bite of betrayal, $r...

<High Inquisitor Fairbanks shakes his head.>$B$BNo... He stood in the background, watching as the legion of undead descended upon us. Soon after, my powers were exhausted. I was the first to fall... Surely they would tear me limb from limb as I lay there unconscious; but they ignored me completely, focusing all of their attention on the Highlord.
<High Inquisitor Fairbanks shakes his head.>$B$BNo, $r; only one of his sons is dead. The other lives...$B$B<High Inquisitor Fairbanks points to the sky.>$B$BThe Outland... Find him there...
The esteemed Doctor Gustaf VanHowzen can train you further.  He can be found in Theramore treating the wounded at the barracks.
Can you see them, mortal? No... I did not think you could. Sighted but sightless - it is your gift and your curse.
You look like you've had your heart broken. Come back when you're not so sad.

Right then... You have to build an arcanite buoy and place it in the ocean. My minnow will be attracted to the magical emanations. When he gets near the buoy - BLAMO! It will explode in a glorious pulse of arcane energy, revealing the minnow's true form. Also, you may or may not incur the wrath of Neptulon. A 50/50 chance I would say.
If I did not know better I would think that you were mocking me, mortal; but yes, that is mostly correct. You may remain fully clothed.

Take this ledger to an old acquaintance of mine in Tanaris. His name is Narain Soothfancy - terrible, terrible, psychic but an amazing engineer! He should be able to make sense of it all.$B$BNo need to thank me, $N. It's the least I could do.$B$BGood day!

You can't teach an old dog new tricks.  At least that's what someone once told me.  Lucky for you, I've discovered it to be untrue.$b$bHowever, pets do tend to get resistant to the technique, and I need more food each time to keep them happy.  What that means is that you'll owe me more money the more times I untrain the same pet.$b$bNow then, would you like me to start untraining?

At last! Someone to free me from this cell!$b$bHigh Executor Hadrec sent us to gather information on the Keep so that a plan could be formulated to overthrow Arugal once and for all.$b$bBut the old wizard has many tricks up his sleeve and we were detected by a magical ward. I was thrown in this prison. Vincent was not so lucky.$b$bI must return to Hadrec to debrief him at once. But first I will pick the lock to the courtyard door for you. Perhaps you can try your luck against the foes that lurk beyond.
The Northpass tower needs our aid!  Once again, let us charge and do proud or liege!
Please cast a high priority BUFF spell on all nearby targets.
Please cast a high priority DEBUFF spell on all nearby targets.
Ah, I can sense it - you've won the day! I believe I can safely transport you to Stratholme now, provided you've paid my colleague there a visit first. Just step into the circle and be patient...

It does my soul good to see the walls of Stormwind standing strong and tall.$b$bIf you're looking to go to Stratholme, I'm afraid I'm unable to assist at the moment. The towers nearby the burning city are still in contention, and as such my powers are far too weak to aid you. Return to me once you're victorious there.

Unpleasant place, this "Undercity". Not at all like the Lordaeron of old. How I miss it...$b$bIf you're looking to go to Stratholme, I'm afraid I'm unable to assist at the moment. The towers nearby the burning city are still in contention, and as such my powers are far too weak to aid you. Return to me once you're victorious there.
Hail, champion. The tale of your deeds will be told throughout the ages. Perhaps one day, a statue of you will stand amongst the heroes of Stormwind.
Let Marshal Windsor know that I am ready.
You made it! Outstanding! Marshal Windsor has been expecting you. Would you like me to signal him now?
Marshal Windsor has been expecting you, $N. Unfortunately, he is currently indisposed. He should be returning shortly.
The spirits of this place are focused against your kind, $r. Perhaps if you win this tower in the flesh, I will be able to aid you.

I can see in your eyes you're no stranger to the tragedy within Stratholme. If you wish to end the miserable existence of the poor souls trapped therein, step into the circle. It leads directly to the gates of the burning city itself.
I am truly sorry, $c, but as your spirit has never before experienced the horrors that lie in wait within the burning wreck of Stratholme, our magic cannot carry you to the city.

Don't be afraid; we're here to aid you. We're grateful for the defense you've granted us within our former home, and as a measure of thanks, we've come to help you return quickly to the Plaguelands should you need it. My compatriot can explain the process further; you'll find him where the arcane energies are strongest within this city.
capture point Progress2
capture point Progress1
capture point Win2
capture point Win1
capture point Contested2
capture point Contested1
Gimme the riding turtle!
Gimme the purple ogre disguise!
Gimme the perpetual purple firework!
Gimme the hippogryph hatchling!
Gimme the tiger cub!
Gimme tabard #3!
Gimme tabard #2!
Gimme tabard #1!
Upperdeck Promotion - Landro Default
What promotions do you have?
|cff33ccffAll four towers are now in control of the Alliance!|r
|cffff0000All four towers are now in control of the Horde!|r
|cffffff00Eastwall Tower has been taken by the Horde!|r
|cffffff00Northpass Tower has been taken by the Horde!|r
|cffffff00The Plaguewood Tower has been taken by the Horde!|r
|cffffff00Crown Guard Tower has been taken by the Horde!|r
|cffffff00Crown Guard Tower has been taken by the Alliance!|r
|cffffff00Eastwall Tower has been taken by the Alliance!|r
|cffffff00Northpass Tower has been taken by the Alliance!|r
|cffffff00The Plaguewood Tower has been taken by the Alliance!|r
You cannot ride a mount in that form.
Take me to Crown Guard Tower.
Take me to Eastwall Tower.
Take me to Northpass Tower.

This constant, annoying resistance is futile, you maggots! There will be nothing in the end but death!

You dare disrupt our works here?! The master will not be pleased. Take this time to prepare yourselves... when we return, there will be nothing but death and destruction in our wake!
So, the frail members of the living have some teeth after all. Take this place, then, for the time being. We will return, twice as strong, and your paltry forces will fall!
The shadow of the Scourge yet remains on this land, fools! You will never prevail!
There is no victory for you here! What little ground you've gained will be swallowed by the Scourge army in due course!
Enjoy your small victory while you can, mortals. It will not stop our eventual triumph over this land!
So you've conquered a small spot of land. A minor setback! The Scourge still reign here!

Greetings, $N. I am Johnny McWeaksauce. I am used as a tool by developers to carry out specific functions for the purpose of testing. For this test period, I am set to do two specific things:$B$B(1) Flag you as having done the Naxxramas attunement quest so that you are able to accept the next quest, "Echoes of War" from Commander Eligor Dawnbringer. You must first complete that quest to be able to access the quests for your Tier 3 armor set.$B$B(2) Teleport you to Naxxramas.$B$BWhat is it that you require?

Losing my life was a danger I had come to terms with.  Losing Ysida is something I cannot endure, even after my own death.
I cannot teach you tribal leatherworking, $N. You must go to Tanaris and find the home of Narain Soothfancy. Once there, consult the book "Soothsaying for Dummies."
I cannot teach you elemental leatherworking, $N. You must go to Tanaris and find the home of Narain Soothfancy. Once there, consult the book "Soothsaying for Dummies."
One by one, nearly everyone involved in this matter has fallen prey to these spectres.  I'll understand if you decide to walk away from this, $N.
Trying to find out more about these creatures hasn't been easy.  My friend and the person who hired his mercenaries to steal Lord Valthalak's spellbook have both been feared dead for a while.
It was not my intention to get you involved in this, $N.  I've spent every waking hour looking over my shoulder ever since I helped an old friend in a daring raid on Blackrock Spire.
I cannot teach you dragonscale leatherworking, $N. You must go to Tanaris and find the home of Narain Soothfancy. Once there, consult the book "Soothsaying for Dummies."

The assortment of images, shapes, and markings come together before your eyes. The book seems to know your skill with leatherworking and offers you a choice - but be warned - you may only select one and once you have done so, may not change your mind!:
I am absolutely certain that I want to learn tribal leatherworking.
I am absolutely certain that I want to learn elemental leatherworking.
I am absolutely certain that I want to learn dragonscale leatherworking.
Come to think about it, most everyone involved is dead.  I'll understand if you don't want to be involved in any of this, $N.
Trying to find out more about my predicament has been nearly impossible.  The smuggler that hired us has vanished and Anthion Harmon, our mercenary company's leader, is dead.

Teach you gnomish engineering? I don't have time for this nonsense. You only get one chance with Oglethorpe and you blew that, didn't you?$B$BYou'll have to head to Tanaris and find Narain Soothfancy's hut. In that hut is a magical book that might be able to jostle whatever is left of your brain and reconnect you with what you've lost.$B$BNow get lost!
I didn't mean to drag you into this, $N.  Ever since we took on a job to steal Lord Valthalak's spellbook, everyone involved has wound up dead or missing.

Teach you the ways of gnomish engineering? Not going to happen! Not this gnome, anyway. You have a stink on you, $N. Maybe this is the pity talking but I will offer some advice.$B$BIn the Tanaris desert you'll find a hut that belongs to Narain Soothfancy. In that hut is a magical book that has been known to do wonderous things. Find that book and you may yet learn the gnomish way.
You're never going to stop coming after me, are you?  Fine, but you won't take me down without a fight!

So you're looking to relearn what you forgot, eh? Or maybe learn what you were never taught? I know just the thing, $N. Over by Steamwheedle port, to the east, you'll find a magical book in Narain's hut called "Soothsaying for Dummies." Give it a read.$B$B<Nixx winks.>$B$BYou'll find all that you need to know and then some...
I am 100% confident that I wish to learn in the ways of gnomish engineering.
I am 100% confident that I wish to learn in the ways of goblin engineering.
The content on the pages of this tome appear to be in constant flux. You feel as if your thoughts are being bled from your mind and consumed by the book.

Welcome back, $N. Have I mentioned how good it is to have someone to talk to?$B$BAlright then, let's get down to business. What's next that we have to do?

$N! You've returned just to talk to me? That's very thoughtful of you, and you look pretty sweet in that outfit, too!$B$BYou don't know how good it makes me feel to see you. It can get pretty lonely up here, what with most of these yahoos not being able to see me, and all. It's a great thing that you did for all of us, and I'll never forget it!$B$BThanks for dropping in and saying hi, and don't be such a stranger.

Thank you for freeing me, my brother, and all of you! We can finally rest in peace now.

What, you don't have a token to give me? Don't you love me?
What?! How did you sneak past my jail...er, minion out there? Well, I suppose it's for the best. Sales have been a little slow lately.$B$BHow may I fulfill your infernal needs, $c?
Time to learn ya about manners, $g sonny:lass;.
Yes, please summon it back!

Yes I checked, I'm missing the left piece!

You've convinced me of your intentions, $N, and you have my thanks for being willing to help out the members of my former mercenary company, The Veiled Blade.$B$BNow let's see, what's next on our list of things to do?
I lost Lord Valthalak's Amulet!

You can see me? Do you know how much I'm ignored up here just because no one can see me? How refreshing to finally have someone to talk to!$B$BSo, you must have been sent by some living member of my former mercenary company, am I right? Of course I am!$B$BBut enough idle chit-chat, there's a great deal of work for you and I if you're going to put things right and return Lord Valthalak's spirit to him!

After all these years of fighting, now everyone's falling in love!
We orcs are usually a private people, but lately, no one's been hiding their feelings.
It seems like love is drifting on the wind. I hope that I won't be left out.
It has been years since I have thought with my heart, but it's all flooding back.
When you have lived as long as I, it becomes easy to forget about love for years. It is always good to be reminded.
You work with machines for so long, sometimes you forget about real hearts.
I don't know what's come over me. My heart feels as hot as new steel.
We've been so wrapped up in this war, some of us forgot to make time for love.
I would like to whisper my secret code to you to receive my Panda Cub pet.

Greetings, $c. I trust that you bring me good news concerning the Worldwide Invitational event? If you are, then surely that means you were given a secret code to tell me. In return for your code I will give you a gift of one of the panda cubs that I take care of.$B$BJust whisper it in my ear when you are ready.

The Might of Kalimdor is victorious! The last of the Qiraji forces are defeated, retreating back to the ancient city-fortress of Ahn'Qiraj. The Qiraji Resonating Crystals littering Kalimdor vanish as quickly as they appeared, leaving behind nothing but sundered earth.
Face the Might of Kalimdor!
Our fates lie ahead...
ONWARD! TO AHN'QIRAJ!
FOR THE HORDE! FOR CAIRNE! FOR THUNDER BLUFF!
For Kalimdor!
For Broxigar!
FOR THE HORDE!

FER MAGNI!
FER THE KING!
FOR HONOR!

Would any of you deny yourselves such a death? Such an honor?
To die today, on this field of battle, is to die an orcish death. To die today is to die for our little ones. Our old ones. Our ... loved ones.
We defend. We stand. We show that as one. United. We destroy. Their god will fall.
And for our gods?
Waiting to crush the life from our little ones. To slay all in their path. This they do for their god.
In those years - where strife filled the land as Legion and Scourge sacked our homes, killed our families - these insects dwelled beneath us. Beneath our homes - waiting.
Some of you have not fought in battles. Peace has been with us for many years. Many years we sat idle but many years we battled.
An orc - a true orc warrior - wishes for one thing: To die in the glory of battle against a hated enemy.
You know me to be the Supreme Commander of the Might of Kalimdor.
I am Saurfang. Brother of Broxigar.
The final battle for Kalimdor is upon us. The supreme commander of the Might of Kalimdor orders his troops to march upon Ahn'Qiraj and destroy all in their path.

I shall take my secrets to the grave with me!

Hello, $c, good of you to show up. Allow me to be succinct; we are gathering supplies for the Ahn'Qiraj war effort. We wouldn't want to have more casualties than necessary, now would we? I am needed here to see that they are properly maintained and to find new, creative applications for their use against the silithid and whatever else awaits us there.

Thanks to the combined efforts of the Alliance's adventuring guilds, we have been able to gather all of the singed corestones we think that we'll need. However, you might want to check around with the other collectors here to see if they still need help in gathering up vital resources.

If we're to persevere in the Ahn'Qiraj War to come, we'll need all of the provisions that we can carry. I'm gathering up spotted yellowtail fish at this location before it is to be shipped out.$B$BAs of now we have $2101w, but we need to collect a total of $2103w if we're going to be able to feed everyone.

Looks like you're too late, $c. We have all of the roast raptor that we need; killed, cooked and salted. Anyway, it looks like some of the others around here could use some help. You should go check with them. I'm going to see if they'll let me go home now.

Oh, hi, $c. I guess the Alliance asked me to come here and keep track of all of this cooked meat that people are gathering because of the impending doom at Ahn'Qiraj. Doesn't that sound like fun?$B$BAnyway, I suppose you'd like to know how much we have. Last time I counted it we were at $2098w out of a total $2099w roast raptor needed.

Well, looks like we have all of the cooked albacore that we can properly salt and store for the upcoming war at Ahn'Qiraj. Thanks for asking though, $c. If you have a mind to, check around with the other collectors. I'd bet there's someone else here that could use your help with gathering up whatever it is that they need.

Mmm, mmm, mmm. Can you smell that?! That's good eatin' right there, $c. Rainbow Fin Albacore hits the spot every time. Slicky Gastronome here, ace connoisseur of all things edible, especially fish. With the Ahn'Qiraj War looming, the Alliance thought it wise to bring in an expert for the war effort, so here I am, large and in charge.$B$BLooks like we're going to need $2093w of the fish, and we've got a pile that currently comes to $2092w.

$C, through the efforts of many we have managed to gather up all of the runecloth bandages that the Alliance feels it needs for the upcoming conflict. Were I you, I would ask some of the others here to see if they still have collection tasks that need fulfilling.

$C, even our hardiest warriors and scouts will need use of the healing arts in the war to come at Ahn'Qiraj. And when there is no magical healing available, they must rely upon our efforts here.$B$BTo date I have collected $2088w runecloth bandages, out of $2090w needed. If you are willing, we should speak further on how you can do your part.

That's very kind of you to ask, but it would appear that we've collected all of the silk bandages that we'll need. You could ask around though and see if anyone else needs help with their collections.

Hello, how are you feeling today, $c? Well, I hope. You may be wondering what is going on here. There's a war at Ahn'Qiraj that is being planned and prepared for. We and the Horde are preparing as best we can for it.$B$BTo that end, the Alliance has asked me to supervise the collection of silk bandages here. To date we've managed to put together $2082w out of $2083w needed. Are you thinking about helping out?
Yes, Ma'am!
<Gaze into the crystalline tear.>
Great sorrow eminates from this crystal.
I should've grabbed a bigger sword.
Aye, lads!  Things are about to get quite ugly.

Thank you for the inquiry, $c, but as you can see, I already have all of the linen bandages that the Alliance feels is necessary in preparation for the war at Ahn'Qiraj. Don't let that stop you from helping out with the other collections going on here though.

Hello, $c. I am collecting linen bandages here for the Ahn'Qiraj war effort; an effort that will put us all to the test, but strengthen us for the war to come. I can assure you that any bandages that you choose to donate will be put to good use in helping to save the lives of our soldiers when the time comes. I am in need of $2077w, and to this point have managed to collect $2076w. Will you assist us?

Wow! Looks like we already gathered all of the thick leather they think we'll need. That sure went by fast. You know, there are probably others around here that could use your help though if ya want to give 'em a hand.

Hi there, $c! With the Ahn'Qiraj War drawing near, our preparations here are in full swing. I'm in charge of thick leather collections. It's a fine day for gathering thick leather, don't ya think? I got my stacks here and it looks like we've got $2069w right now. Our magic number is $2071w. Want to help out?

Ah, um, yes $g sir : ma'am;. It would appear that we have collected all of the medium leather that the Alliance feels is necessary for the war. I'm told that there may be others here though that still need your assistance with their collection efforts.

$G Sir : Ma'am;, yes $g sir : ma'am;! Private Porter reporting for duty and ready to assist you with your medium leather collection needs. The Ahn'Qiraj War is coming and we need to be as prepared as we can be.$B$BAs you can see we have collected exactly $2063w pieces of medium leather, and I have been tasked with gathering a total of $2064w.
You're sweet for asking, $c, but we have all of the light leather that we need. May be that one of the others in charge of collecting around here is in need of your assistance though?
Your actions shame us all, $c. I hurt inside as I beat you senseless.
Believe me when I tell you this: You're gonna wish you weren't born, sissy!
Get a rope!
We don't take kindly to miscreants, $r.
You dare spill blood on neutral ground? OUT! OUT, I SAY!

The Ahn'Qiraj War is on the horizon, $c, and in preparation the Alliance has asked my family to gather up a good deal of light leather for the war effort. Out of $2061w needed, we currently have $2060w. You look the type that might be able to help out.
I get reports of your exploits against the Abyssal Council all the time, $N.  You're doing great things out there!$B$BKeep it up, and we'll make it worth the effort!
I guess that's that. We have all of the Arthas' Tears necessary. You might try asking around. One of these others is sure to have something that they still need collected for the war effort.

We're preparing for war, $c. We've taken all that we're going to from the Silithid and their masters in Ahn'Qiraj. To get ready for it we're collecting all sorts of material. I'm in charge of gathering Arthas' Tears. Not sure what we need them for though. If you ask me I don't want anything to do with that madman, even if it is just a flower named after him.$B$BStill, I'm my father's daughter, and a soldier, so I do what I'm told. Currently we have $2057w and need to collect a grand total of $2058w.

It is with satisfaction that I relay to you we have collected all of the purple lotus that we feel we need. Thank you for your contribution to the effort, $c. If you are so inclined, there are most likely several still here that are collecting other resources for the struggle.

Greetings, young $c. In preparation for the war at Ahn'Qiraj against the Silithid, the Alliance has asked me to head up their collection of purple lotus. This flower has many uses that I am aware of, and thus, I have agreed to help them attain $2055w. To date we have collected $2053w.

Not that I'm quite sure that you could ever possibly in a gazillion years have enough stranglekelp, what with all the ice cream one needs, but we seem to have enough. Or that's what I'm told anyway. It looks like some of the others here might need help with whatever it is that they're collecting. Understandable really when you consider that theirs just couldn't possibly be as fun as collecting stranglekelp.

It's true, even stranglekelp can be quite useful in building up what we need for the upcoming war at Ahn'Qiraj! It has so many uses, like making ice cream for hot days under the Silithus sun, as a salve for the effects of some icky plants, breathing underwater, hardening the skin, making you quick, regaining magic power; so many things I can't think of them all! Did I mention making ice cream?$B$BAnywhoodles, I've got about $2047w here, and I need a total of $2048w!
Thank you for checking in with me, $c. We now have all of the thorium bars that we'll need, but you may want to ask some of the others here that are in charge of different collection efforts.

$C, please listen to what I have to say. The Alliance and Horde are preparing for a war with the Silithid and their masters in Ahn'Qiraj. Any assistance that you can lend will be greatly appreciated. As you can see, I am collecting thorium bars here for the war effort. We need to gather $2012w in total, and currently we have $2011w.

Thanks to everyone's efforts we now have all the iron bars that we need. Check with one of the others to see if there's something else you should be out there collecting for the war effort. Me, I'm going to see if I can get out of here a little early to play some cards.

Listen up, flapjack, we're in for the fight of our lives with the bugs in Ahn'Qiraj and we need to get prepared for it. I'm collecting iron bars here.  Currently, the Alliance only has $2002w iron bars, but we're projected to need a total of $2003w for the war effort.
Not all Tauren despise your kind, $r. Alas, I am forbidden to offer you my services.
Greetings, $r. Wonderful day to be alive, is it not?
<Touch the unstable rift crystal.>
You see large cavernous tunnels and corridors reflected inside the crystal. You recognize the area as the Molten Core.
Krathok, I was once a weaponsmith and wish to instead learn the ways of the armorsmith. Will you train me?
Krathok, I was once an armorsmith and wish to instead learn the ways of the weaponsmith. Will you train me?
Myolor, I was once a weaponsmith and wish to instead learn the way of the armorsmith. Will you teach me?
Myolor, I was once an armorsmith and wish to instead learn the way of the weaponsmith. Will you teach me?

$C, I need more copper bars! There's a war brewing at the Gates of Ahn'Qiraj and we need supplies! The Alliance has collected $1997w and we need $1998w copper bars in total. If I don't get those copper bars, it's going to be my head on a platter!
We have all the copper bars that we need. Thank you for your assistance, $c. You might wanna help out with the other materials being collected here.
All the resources have been gathered.  Yippee!
Come, puny mortals. Come and face your end. The secrets of Ahn'Qiraj will die with Roman'khan!
You're back already!  What can I do for you now?
The evil in these stones is strong, but it has been dispelled.
Uh oh...
Prepare to meet your doom!
Pathetic fool!  Now I will teach you the meaning of pain!
No!  It can't be...
I want to buy another stink bomb!
Sergeant Hartman!  I need to buy another stink bomb cleaner!
I am despawning from $N.

What ISN'T there to do, you mean!$B$BEach of the innkeepers throughout the world are handing out trick-or-treat goodies, and many of the towns are decorated for the season!  Also, Sergeant Hartman in Southshore needs help against the Forsaken and their Wickerman Festival.$B$BOne more thing - I've heard that a sick little boy at the orphanage in Stormwind is looking for someone to help him gather treats for the holiday.

What ISN'T there to do, you mean!$B$BEach of the innkeepers throughout the world are handing out trick-or-treat goodies, and many of the towns are decorated for the season!  Also, there is the Wickerman Festival just outside the Undercity during the evenings.$B$BOne more thing - I've heard that a sick little girl at the orphanage here in Orgrimmar is looking for someone to help her gather treats for the holiday... maybe you could help her out?
What is there to do on Hallow's End?
What Hallow's End candy do you have for sale?
You're the best, $N - thanks for going trick-or-treating for me!
I'm sad!  It's Hallow's End, and I'm sick.  I'm going to miss out on trick-or-treating because I can't go out!
Killing you and your cohorts, $c, will amuse me.  I shall make it quick.
Happy Hallow's End!  How do you like my mask?  Very scary!
Happy Hallow's End!  Do you like my mask?  Very scary!
What?  Such a small, frail thing beckons me?  I shall add your bones to my throne, $r!!
You dare!  Outrageous!  I curse you, $c.  I curse you with... death!
Imposter!  It is a dishonor without equal to be summoned by a whelp such as you!  DIE!
What?  Such a small, frail thing beckons me?  This will not go unpunished!
This act of defiance will not go unpunished.  You, and your world, will die!
You will pay the ultimate price for this insolence, little vermin.  Your soul is mine!
I may have ninety-nine problems, but dancin' ain't one of them!  Happy Hallow's End, $N!
Chugga-chugga, woo-woo!  Happy Hallow's End, $N!
Bawk, bawk, bawk!  Happy Hallow's End, $N!
Ooo, so strong!  Happy Hallow's End, $N!
And what do you say?
What do they say?
How do you know?
Greetings, ancient one. I have done all that has been asked of me. I now ask that you grant me Lok'delar.
Greetings, ancient one. I have done all that has been asked of me. I now ask that you grant me Rhok'delar.
Greetings, $N.

I highly recommend that you visit Sayge to get your fortune told. I know, I know... he's a gnoll.  But he's a very special gnoll with the power to divine your future!$B$BAnd we are constantly expanding the faire with all manner of new attractions!
What other things can I do at the faire?
What are Darkmoon Cards?
What are Darkmoon Faire Prize Tickets and how do I get them?
What can I purchase?

I've come back to my old home so my knowledge may be passed on.  Unlike the mindless undead around me, I've chosen this unlife for my own reasons.$B$BThe silithid are formidable opponents, $N.  I've learned to respect them as much as I despise them.$B$BMuch of their deadliness comes from the strength and lightness of their chitin, which I've learned to work into armor.  As we seem to have a common enemy I shall teach you my trade.
Tell me how to use the Blastenheimer 5000 Ultra Cannon.
Show me what I can learn.
The ghostly figure looks at you with mistrust in her eyes and remains silent.

Hail $c. Didn't I see you recently at an exclusive gathering? You look familiar, but then again this city is a busy place.$B$BIf you attended that convention, then surely you were given a secret code. Tell me your code and I will give you a special prize in return.
<Use the transcription device to gather a rubbing.>
You were always the troublemaker in the family, Noggle.  Always!
A thunderous voice bellows from the stone...$B$BWhat is this?  I sense a little cultist scurrying about!  Run along, vermin, or face the wrath of the lords of the Council!

A thunderous voice bellows from the stone...$B$BI sense your Medallion of Station, cultist, but you have no ring of lordship?  Are you truly a commander of the Twilight's Hammer, or do you merely run errands for your betters?
What bug comes before the lords of the Council?  A bug, no doubt, wishing to be squashed!
A clear voice rises from within the stone...$B$BYou come to us with title and so we will listen, but do not try our patience, $c.  The council has no time for idle gossip from one such as you.
A clear voice rises from within the stone...$B$BWhere is your Medallion of Station, little one?  You may not speak with a Duke without proof of title...
C'Thun will retake this world!
Thanks for the information, Frankal.
What a story! So she went into Hive'Regal and that was the last you saw of her?
Then what?
I've been meaning to ask you about that monkey.
You couldn't handle a lone night elf priestess?
That's odd.
That's what I like to hear.
Hello, Frankal. I've heard that you might have some information as to the whereabouts of Mistress Natalia Mar'alith.
I'll be back once I straighten this mess out.
Possessed by what?
Lost it? What do you mean?
What demands?
Natalia?
What happened to her after that?
That sounds dangerous.
Hello, Rutgar. The Commander has sent me here to gather some information about his missing wife.
Skwol!  I hold your scepter!  I command you to enter this world!
Kazum!  I hold your scepter!  I command you to enter this world!
Whirlaxis!  I hold your scepter!  I command you to enter this world!
Skaldrenox!  I hold your scepter, and charge you to enter this world!
The day of judgement has come, fiend!  I challenge you to battle!
A thunderous voice bellows from the stone...$B$BGreetings, commander.  What news of Silithus do you bring the Lords of the Council?
Hey!  Thanks for saving my hide!  I think I'll be lying down for a while until I recover my strength.
Duke of Fathoms! I hold your signet!  Heed my call!
Duke of Shards! I hold your signet!  Heed my call!
Duke of Zephyrs! I hold your signet!  Heed my call!
Duke of Cynders! I hold your signet!  Heed my call!
You will listen to this, vile duke!  I am not your Twilight's Hammer lapdog!  I am here to challenge you!  Come!  Come, and meet your death...
How dare you commune with a Duke of the Council, worm!
Your life is a fitting sacrifice for my master, $c.
My lord will be outraged to learn of this ambush.  Let us hope your death will appease him.
Trick or Treat!
Azure Templar!  I hold your crest of beckoning.  Heed my summons!
Earthen Templar!  I hold your crest of beckoning.  Heed my summons!
Hoary Templar!  I hold your crest of beckoning.  Heed my summons!

It's a pleasure to see you again, $N.  Your aid has provided us with a considerable boost in the security of our supply lines.  I hope you understand the importance of the logistics involved in large battle efforts such as this.
Crimson Templar!  I hold your crest of beckoning.  Heed my summons!
I am no cultist, you monster!  Come to me and face your destruction!
Be gone, infidel!  May the power of the Abyss smite you down!
I am ready to hear your tale, Baristolth.
Baristolth, I have lost my badge and require a replacement.
So... cold...
Go Forsaken!  Yay us!
You like candy?  I like candy.
Happy Hallow's End, $c!
Smear the ash on my face like war paint!
The ashes from the burning wickerman radiate magical power.
Can ye hear it, stranger? The humming is gettin' louder with each passing day. These crystals must be what's driving these bugs crazy.

The Commander has not been himself as of late. His mistress disappeared while on an archaeological dig in the southern desert - vanished without a trace! Very strange, indeed.$B$BI suppose you're looking for work? Do I need to bash you in the head with a clue?
I wish to stable my pet.
I wish to browse your wares, Calandrath.

Greetings, traveler. As long as you remain within the walls of the Cenarion Hold, you will be safe from harm.$B$BBe wary when leaving the protection of the Hold as the silithid have been swarming as of late.
Something different!!!
Hi!  I'm Luis!  What do you think of me so far...?
The battle for Alterac Valley has begun!
30 seconds until the battle for Alterac Valley begins.
1 minute until the battle for Alterac Valley begins.
$N claims the Snowfall graveyard!  If left unchallenged, the Horde will control it!
$N claims the Snowfall graveyard!  If left unchallenged, the Alliance will control it!
The Horde wins!
The Alliance wins!
The attackers have fled!  Strength and honor to the Horde!
Game start timer disabled.
Don't make me angry! You wouldn't like me when I'm angry!
Yes, please do.

I am Samuel Hawke, the main supplier for the League of Arathor posted here at Arathi Basin.  As you improve your standing with us, I will make available to you a fine selection of goods that you might find useful.  Should you find yourself in need of item repair, I also provide those services.
What goods have I earned the right to purchase from the League of Arathor?

I am Rutherford Twing, the main supplier for the Defilers posted here at Arathi Basin.  As you improve your standing with us, I will make available to you a fine selection of goods that you might find useful.  Should you find yourself in need of item repair, I also provide those services.
What goods have I earned the right to purchase from the Defilers?
I wish to untrain my pet.
I can get back to the Stronghold on my own, I think.  Now that you bought me some time, I should be able to stealth out of here.  Who ever you are... thank you.  May Elune bless you always!
Not now.  Have you any tasks for me?
We, the Zandalarian trolls, traveled here from distant islands, for we cannot ignore the threat that now faces our world.
The Soulflayer is defeated!  Our leader, Molthor, now calls more of his servants...
Take heart!$B$BThe Soulflayer has been defeated and his wretched heart has been cast into the nether!
The Blood God, the Soulflayer, has been defeated!  We are imperiled no longer!

Behind me is the Altar of Zanza, a sacred place for us Zandalar.  We pray here to bolster our resolve in preparation for war against the Blood God, Hakkar.$B$BProve yourself to the tribe by using the altar to destroy any of the Hakkari Bijous you might find inside Zul'Gurub.  Also, I will trade you Honor Tokens our tribe uses for sets of coins you may find in Zul'Gurub.  Bring me the coins that I seek, and you will be rewarded!
We have a winner!  $N is the Master Angler!
And the Tastyfish have gone for the week!   I will remain for another hour to allow you to turn in your fish!
Let the Fishing Tournament BEGIN!
I wish to speak to the spirits, Tiev.
Listen, young $c.  You hear the call of water?
You've angered me for the last time $n!
Yay!
Wow!
The Horde has gathered $1777W resources, and is near victory!
The Alliance has gathered $1776W resources, and is near victory!

Greetings!  I am here to promote a tournament to test your fishing skill in Stranglethorn.  To participate you need enough might to survive there and have enough skill in fishing to coax the fish from the water.$B$B Come back later when you are more qualified!
Pledge your allegiance to Hakkar and the pain you suffer shall be minimal.
The Primal Gods serve Hakkar. Turn back now, you stand no chance.
Your gods can't save you now, $c.
The world will suffer immeasurable cruelties under my reign.
Surrender your soul, mortal.
You will make a fitting sacrifice.
Hakkar will rule the world!
You will suffer eternally, $r.
The Silverwing Sentinels shall be in your debt, $c.  You will find Elfarran, our battlemaster, inside Stormwind Keep, attending the boy-king's audience.  Goddess watch over you!
You show wisdom beyond your years, $c.  Thank you. You can find our battlemaster, Lylandris, standing at the war table in the Hall of Arms. She can assist you in traveling to Warsong Gulch.
The Light of Elune shine upon thee, $N!  You will find Aethalas, our battlemaster, on the Warrior's Terrace.  She will aid you on your way to Warsong Gulch.
The seasons turn for all in due time, but you are still in the springtime of your life.  Please return to us later, $c, when you have experienced more.
I am released through you! Avenge me!

Excellent!  You shall be doing the League of Arathor a great service in ridding Arathi Basin of The Defilers and their Horde thugs.  Seek out the Lady Hoteshem in the royal audience chamber of Stormwind Keep.  She has been expecting you, $N.
We shall be in your debt, $c.  Look for Donal Osgood in the Hall of Arms.  He will be more than happy to aid you in your journey to Arathi Basin.
Thank you, $N!  You will find Keras Wolfheart on the Warrior's Terrace near the trainers there.  He will guide your way to Arathi Basin.  Good luck and great honor upon thee.
Good for you, $c!  Our battlemaster, Thelman Slatefist, can be found in the King's audience chambers inside Stormwind Keep.  He will help you get to Alterac Valley.
You've made the right decision, $c.  You'll find our battlemaster, Glordrum Steelbeard, in the Hall of Arms.  Good luck, $N!
Excellent, $N!  You shall find Brogun Stoneshield on the Warrior's Terrace.  He can help you to get to Alterac Valley.
Honor and praise will be yours for the taking, $c!  Look for Kurden Bloodclaw in this city's Royal Quarter.
You have chosen wisely, $N.  Seek out Kergul Bloodaxe on the Hunter Rise.  He will assist you on your journey to Warsong Gulch.
Then it is with great pride that I tell you that Brakgul Deathbringer stands ready in the Hall of Arms to aid you on your way to Warsong Gulch. Seek him out in the Valley of Honor.
Unfortunately you are not yet strong enough to survive in Warsong Gulch, $c.
Very good, $N.  You will find Grizzle Halfmane in the Royal Quarter of the Undercity.  May you find great honor in Alterac Valley.
Your name will be remembered down through the ages, $N.  Seek out Taim Ragetotem on the Hunter Rise and he will assist you on your way to Alterac Valley.
Honor to your house and ancestors, $c!  You will find Kartra Bloodsnarl inside the Hall of the Brave in the Valley of Honor.
You need to be stronger, $c before you can help us in Alterac Valley.
And a great deal of honor you shall have, I am sure.  Speak with Martin Lindsey at the Pools of Vision.  It is a cave located in the side of the Spirit Rise.
Of course, of course.  Please speak with Deze Snowbane at the Hall of the Brave in the Valley of Honor of this city, $c.
I am so glad that you asked.  You will find Sir Malory Wheeler at the Royal Quarter in the presence of our Dark Lady.
I wish to join the battle!
You are not yet powerful enough, $c.  Move along.
Your callous disregard for the sovereign might of the Gurubashi Empire has been noted. The inhabitants of Zul'Gurub have been alerted to your presence.

Hey Hey Hey!  I am here to promote a fabulous fishing tournament in Stranglethorn but you need to be tough enough to survive there and have enough skill in fishing to fish those waters.$B$B Come back later when you are more qualified!

Wushoolay, the Storm Witch.$B$BHer power is the power of the sky, the rain, and the shattered earth.  May she once again reign mother to the Gurubashi.$B$BWushoolay now rages near the edge of madness.

Wushoolay, the Storm Witch.$B$BHer power is the power of the sky, the rain, and the shattered earth.  May she once again reign mother to the Gurubashi.  $B$BWushoolay now dwells far from here.  One day, she may return...
Renataki, of the Thousand Blades.$B$BPain is his lifeblood.  Fear, his ally.  May he one day return and bring joyous bloodshed with him.$B$BRenataki now dwells near the edge of madness.

Renataki, of the Thousand Blades.$B$BPain is his lifeblood.  Fear, his ally.  May he one day return and bring joyous bloodshed with him.  $B$BRenataki now dwells far from here.  One day, he may return...
Hazza'rah, the Dreamweaver.$B$BHis is the power of nightmares, and may his foes ever sleep.$B$BHazza'rah now dreams near the edge of madness.
Hazza'rah, the Dreamweaver.$B$BHis is the power of nightmares, and may his foes ever sleep.  $B$BHazza'rah now dwells far from here.  One day, he may return...
Gri'lek, of the Iron Blood$B$BThe wanderer.  May his strength and lust for battle pierce the ages.$B$BGri'lek now lingers near the edge of madness...
If that is your wish $c, then you will need to speak to Keras Wolfheart on the Warrior's Terrace.  He is a representative of The League of Arathor and can help you to get to Arathi Basin.
The humans definitely need all of our help in Arathi Basin.  The one that you wish to speak to is named Keras Wolfheart.  He stands ready to assist you on the Warrior's Terrace.
Arathi Basin

It's admirable what The League of Arathor is attempting to do in Arathi Basin.  Too bad those undead abominations and their Horde friends are standing in the way.  Head over to Stormwind Keep.  Lady Hoteshem awaits you in the King's audience chamber.  She can help you to get to Arathi Basin.
In the King's audience chamber you will find the Lady Hoteshem.  She can assist you in getting to Arathi Basin where The League of Arathor is in need of assistance against The Defilers.
The League of Arathor is trying to reclaim their ancestral holdings in Arathi Basin from the Forsaken.  If you would aid them $N speak to Donal Osgood in the Hall of Arms.
The humans are in need of your assistance in their fight against The Forsaken at Arathi Basin.  Go to the Hall of Arms and speak with their representative, Donal Osgood.
You wish to aid The Defilers in their fight against The League of Arathor in Arathi Basin?  Very well, you should ask Martin Lindsey for his assistance then.  Look for him in the Pools of Vision.
You may seek out Martin Lindsey inside the Pools of Vision, underneath the Spirit Rise.  He will assist you on your way to Arathi Basin.
Your deaths feed my strength!
Arathi Basin place to take from soft humans.  Sir Malory Wheeler send you there.
You go Royal Quarter.  See Sir Malory Wheeler.  Him scary.

Mudskunks are a particularly smelly breed of fish that likes tropical waters.  The Zulian Mudskunk - the smelliest of them all, can only be found in the steamy waters of Zul'Gurub.$B$BThe Zulian Mudskunks are what I believe attracted Gahz'ranka to the place, though trolls will probably tell you he's one of their gods...$B$BBelieve what you like, but mark me - fill one of my lures with Zulian Mudskunks and that old boy will come, for sure!
How do I catch the mudskunks for your lure?
You wish to help the Forsaken with their fight against the humans in Arathi Basin?  Then go to the Hall of the Brave and speak with Deze Snowbane.
Go to the Hall of the Brave.  You will find The Defiler, Deze Snowbane there to assist you in getting to Arathi Basin.

I make 'em myself!$B$BBut you need more than just the lure; you need some mudskunks too... you need to place them in the lure to give it a rank old smell!$B$BWhen you have the mudskunks, throw the lure off Pagle's Point in Zul'Gurub... and then grab a drink and wait... but not too long, because Gahz'ranka is sure to come a'stomping!

Welcome to the Booty Bay fishing contest where each week we choose the finest fisherman to be the Master Angler!

Between 2pm and 4pm schools of tastyfish will appear up and down the coast of Stranglethorn.  While fishing if your fishing bobber lands in a tastyfish school then you will catch something from the school rather than the normal stranglethorn fishing fare.

The first is a primal token that must be taken from the most powerful of the Hakkari lieutenants: Jin'do and the Bloodlord.$B$BThe second is a punctured voodoo doll. These can be found in the piles of refuse that litter this foul place. Look inside the jinxed Hoodoo piles.$B$BBring me these things and I will create a powerful enchantment for you!
What are the components?
Zanza can create the ancient troll enchantments with the right components. This magic will help you in defeating Hakkar and his minions.$B$BI only ask that you bring me two items.
Arcanum? That sounds very familiar.

Have you? Then you know how weak and pathetic the high elf version of troll magic was?$B$BThe high elves could not understand why a people with their magical affinity could not contend with the powers of troll voodoo. This was an inconceivable notion for the pale skins to understand. They were resigned to using the bastardized version of troll enchantments. I believe they called them 'Arcanum.'
I think I have heard of this magic.

A friend of the Zandalrian! You have ventured deep into the lair of the Blood God, $c. You will do well to listen to what I have to say.$B$BMany thousands of years ago, while the indigenous trolls of the Zul'Aman empire were battling the invading high elf heathens, great magic was stolen from Zanza. This magic was used by the high elves to enchant their weapons and armor to assist in conquering the trolls of the region.
I am Zanza, a Loa of Zandalar. I have come in this ethereal form from Zandalar to help my people. Hakkar has no dominion over my soul.$B$BI help those that have helped the Zandalarian people.
Betina, I'd like a replacement Rune of the Dawn please!
Bless you, mortals, for this release...Hakkar controls me no longer!
Betina, I'd like a replacement Seal of the Dawn please!
Blood and souls for Hakkar!  HAHAHAH!
It is true, $N.  The wheels of doom now turn, inevitably, toward the true return of Hakkar!

Feel da big bad voodoo!
Troll mojo da strongest mojo!
Your skull gonna decorate our ritual altars!
I gonna make you into mojo!
You be dead soon!

Come one, come all!  Welcome to the Darkmoon Faire!  Do you crave adventure?  Do you seek exotic and mysterious treasures?  Then look no further!  You, my friend, have come to the right place!  Dive right in and take part in all that the Faire has to offer!  We'll be at this location all week, so be sure to tell your friends and loved ones!

Greetings friends, and welcome to the greatest show on Azeroth!$B$BPlease, step right up and take in all we have to offer.  Ride the rides and see the sights!  Amaze at the wonders that the Darkmoon Faire has uncovered in this vast and mysterious world!  We have spared no expense in bringing you excitement that children of all ages will delight in!

Welcome one and all to the greatest show on all of Azeroth... the Darkmoon Faire!  Adventure and excitement await, don't be shy!  Mysteries and prizes for both the young and the old are here for the taking.  And be sure to speak with the professor about any Darkmoon Cards that you have come across during your travels!

Welcome one and all to the Darkmoon Faire, the greatest event in all the world!  We have it all... delicious food, strong drink, exotic artifacts, fortunes read, amazing prizes and excitement without end!  Don't forget to turn in your Darkmoon Faire Prize Tickets to Gelvas Grimegate!  All it takes is five or more and you're on your way to the most wondrous prizes on all of Azeroth.  Everybody is a winner!

Come one, come all.  Welcome to the Darkmoon Faire!  Don't be shy.  Step right up to Lhara and buy yourself an exotic artifact from far off lands.  If you're one of the lucky few who have found Darkmoon Cards, have a word with Professor Paleo.  Hungry?  Thirsty?  You're in luck!  Refreshments are available right here from Sylannia and Stamp.  I recommend the Darkmoon Special Reserve to wash down some Red Hot Wings.  And if the future is what you seek, then run, don't walk, to speak with Sayge.

Everyone enjoying themselves so far?  That's great!  Welcome to the Darkmoon Faire, the greatest show on all of Azeroth!  Make sure that you speak with Yebb and his friends here while you're taking in Neblegear's Darkmoon Zoo Bizarre.
Prizes!  Get your prizes right here!  Get over here and turn in your Darkmoon Faire Prize Tickets for valuable prizes!
Five tickets or two-hundred and fifty, it doesn't matter friend, everybody is a winner!
Mysterious prizes await the adventurous.  Step right up, step right up!
Tickets! Redeem your Darkmoon Faire Prize Tickets here!  Wondrous and exotic prizes are waiting for you!
Have you any Darkmoon Faire Cards?  Come speak with me to learn more about them if you dare!
If you wait to come see me, there may be nothing left!
Come speak with me if you are a purveyor of the unusual, or if you have any Darkmoon Faire Cards.
I have a fine selection of exotic potions and scrolls.  But they're not for the faint of heart!
You there!  Yes you!  You look thirsty.  Get over here, I have just what you need!
Just in... another batch of Darkmoon Special Reserve.  Come get yours before they're all gone!
Huzzah for the tipper!  Step right up and get your delicious, cold drinks right here!
Cheap Beer!  Get your Cheap Beer right here!
The longer you wait, the less future you have for me to foretell.
Fear not!  All fortunes can be discerned for those who know the way.
Come speak with me, and what once was cloudy shall become crystal clear.
Come to me true believers, and see what the future holds for you!

Hi $N!  Thanks for all the help you've given me!  Right now I don't need anything, but who knows what the future will bring?$B$BEnjoy yourself, and remember to tell your friends about the Darkmoon Faire!
Welcome to the Darkmoon Faire, $c!$B$BMy name is Kerri Hicks and I'd shake your hand but I'm afraid I'd break it, because I'm the strongest woman alive!
Hello friend.

When the Darkmoon Faire is open, it will be located in Elwynn Forest.  We'll be pitching our tents just south of Goldshire!
The next location of the Darkmoon Faire has not been finalized yet, but when it is you and I will be the first to know!
The Darkmoon Faire has already arrived, you say?  Where is it located?
When the Darkmoon Faire arrives, where will it be located?
Boys and girls - children of all ages - the Darkmoon Faire has arrived!  Huzzah!
The Darkmoon Faire will only be live for a short time before the curtains are drawn closed.  Be sure to visit it today!
The Darkmoon Faire has come to town!  Be sure to experience the most thrilling show you'll ever see!
It's here!  The Darkmoon Faire is now open for business!  Be sure to see the most exciting show on all of Azeroth!
Be sure to catch all the amazing sights and wonders of the Darkmoon Faire when it comes to town!
Step right up and hear about the most amazing spectacle in all of Azeroth - the Darkmoon Faire!  Huzzah!
The Darkmoon Faire is coming!  There is fun for children of ALL ages!  Come one, come all!
The Darkmoon Faire is coming to town!  Don't miss it!
I'd love to get one of those written fortunes you mentioned!  I've got the space in my inventory for it.
I would remain silent about the kill and allow the knight to claim the reward to aid his family.
I would show my liege the beast's ear and claim the beast's death as my own - after all, I did slay it.  I would then offer some of the reward to the destitute knight to help his family.
I would show my liege the beast's ear and claim the beast's death as my own, taking the reward for my own use.  It is wrong to claim a deed as your own that someone else in fact did.
I would create some surreptitious means to keep my brother out of the order.  I can keep him out without him being any bit wiser, thereby saving our familial bonds.
I would speak for my brother joining the order, potentially risking the safety of the order.  I could help him with the order's regimens, and I'd have faith in his ability to adapt and learn.

I would speak against my brother joining the order, rushing a permanent breech in our relationship.  He would be a danger to himself and those around him, and that is too great a risk hoping he would improve over time.
I quietly ignore the insult.  I will not tell my liege, as I am to secure peace at all costs.  It's only an insult - not a declaration of war.
I not-so-quietly ignore the insult, hoping to instill a fear in the ruler that he may have gaffed.  I then inform my liege of the insult when I return.
I confront the ruler on his malicious behavior, upholding my liege's honor at the risk of any future diplomacy.
I risk my own life and free him so that he may prove his innocence.  If I can, I'll help him in any way.
I execute him as per my liege's instructions, but doing so in as painless of a way as possible.  Justice must be served, but I can show some compassion.
I execute him as per my liege's instructions, and do it in such a manner that he suffers painfully before he dies as retribution for his crimes against my people.
Tell me about the Warlords Deck.

That's right friend!  The Darkmoon Faire is going to be right here.  Just as soon as I unload those huge wagons, put up all the tents, erect the zoo and pour the drinks.  Make sure you come back!
Faire's a coming!
Can't you see I've got work to do here?
