Grumnus be your man, $N. He'll school you in the art of the armorsmith.
Speak with Ironus, $N. He'll be the one training you in the way of the weaponsmith.

If you have come looking for the gift of fast and safe mobility, then you have arrived at your destination!  This year's model of the new Mechano-striders have recently arrived, and I am ready to show you all they have to offer!
Um... I think you're a little too big to ride a Mechano-strider there, $g mister : ma'am;.  You'd likely crush the finely tuned servo-balancers!

Erm... I really don't know you that well, sorry.  I mean, as an authorized Mechano-strider dealer, I really only can sell my mounts to those people who are considered a friend of the gnomes.  If you ever are recognized as friendly to Gnomeregan, I'd be happy to show you what I have to offer.

By the grace of Elune, I am pleased to offer you the finest steed found anywhere in Teldrassil, and perhaps the world - the nightsaber.  For years, the Sentinel Army has relied on the value of these companions.$B$BTake your time friend and examine each one to your satisfaction.  I am sure you will not be disappointed.

Alas $c, you are not considered to be a true friend of Darnassus and the night elves of Teldrassil.  Only when you prove yourself to be friendly to us through deeds - not just mere words - will I then make available my selection of mounts for your perusal.
The time has come, my $g brother : sister; in arms, to take back the night from the Scourge!

Your skill in blacksmithing is exceptional, $N. The time has come to make a decision. There are two paths you may choose: The way of the weaponsmith or the art of the armorsmith.$B$BBe warned, when you have chosen to dedicate yourself to a path, there is no going back. The discipline each path requires leaves no room for hybrids.
I wish to become a weaponsmith.
I wish to become an armorsmith.
Greetings, $N. I am Myolor Sunderfury, keeper of the Great Forge.
Here comes the postmaster!
No chance!
Certainly!
Try again!
I can travel faster on my own from here, $N. Meet Jessir Moonbow near Ashenvale. She should be with the druids of the Emerald Circle. She'll tell you what to do next. Thank you so much for your help!
NO! What have they done to you!?
I wish to make a purchase.
Let's get out of here, $N. I'm ready now!
Rivendare must be destroyed!
May Kel'Thuzad one day feel our vengeance.
Praise be to Egan!
The curse ends!
FREE!!!
Thank you, $N. My torment is now at an end.

I'm sorry $g mon : sis;, but I won't be sellin' my raptors to someone who hasn't proven themselves to be a friendly to the Darkspear tribe.  When ya make a stand and show yourself to be at least friendly to us, then I'll make my raptors available to ya.

And a good day to ya, brave $c.  I know ya be lookin' for a fine steed.  There's no finer steed than a raptor under your reigns, lemme tell you $g mon : sis;!  Take a look at the ones I got to offer - bred from the fiercest stock anywhere.
I only make my mounts available to those who are considered friendly to Orgrimmar and the Orcish race.  Go prove yourself to us, and I'll make my mighty wolves available for your inspection.

Zug zug, brave $c!  I have the finest bred wolf mounts for you to peruse.  You'll not find another animal with the level of endurance and survival instincts that the wolf has anywhere!  Please, inspect them for yourself.
Our defenses are failing!  By the light we must prevail!
Skeletons have advanced past the Hall of Lights!  Destroy them!
We've failed, $N!!
I'm ready, $N. Let's find my equipment and get out of here. I think I know where it is.
Welcome to flavor country!
Ramstein hunger for flesh!
Destroy the records before the bastion falls!
Leave nothing behind!
The bastion is falling! Burn the evidence!
Looking for these???? You'll never have em!
Who dares disturb our master?
The temperature is... not hot enough!
Have you seen Watcher Backus? So brave...$B$BI think he's the toughest of all the Night Watch. I wonder if he even notices I'm around....
Just sit right back and you'll hear a ta... *hic* a tai... *hic* a taiiii *hic* Damnit!
I should have taken the translucent pill.
The what-bringer? Oh, ASHbringer? Never heard of it... What? Stop bothering me!
Hey! Do you like the sauce? The sauce is good, no?
I can't take these taxes! F.I.C.A. me? F.I.C.A. YOU!
I don't get paid enough for this bull excrement!

Hi! I just got back from exploring the Ruins of Kel'Theril, to the southwest. Now I'm intent on investigating the Wildkin that lie just up the ridge here, in Owl Wing Thicket.$B$BHave you spoken to Erelas Ambersky in Rut'theran Village? He requested that I come here, and perhaps he has a task for you as well.
Mailbox

I don't know how they do it...  those mailboxes must be magic portals or something.  Why I see people gathered around the mailbox next to the bank all day pulling swords and shields and various armor all from that small box!
There is a mailbox located conveniently right between the Stormwind Bank and The Gilded Rose Inn in the Trade District.
Used by the Barov family of the Scholomance as a mirror into the souls that they no longer possess. A valuable keepsake.
The threads that holds together the abominations of Stratholme are highly sought after by artisan craftsmen: Extremely resilient - nearly unbreakable.

Legend claims that in places of extreme conflict, across what is now known as the Plaguelands; clean and holy springs may erupt from the ground. The water from those springs has been named 'Blood of Heroes,' by artisans and commonfolk alike - in honor of those that fell in the war against the Scourge.
Commonly found on the lesser chromatic flight: Whelps, broodlings, lesser wyrmkin.
Presumed to exist. Only a greater chromatic dragonkin or dragon could possess such a carapace.
Information on the Skin of Shadow.
Information on Frayed Abomination Stitchings.
Information on the Blood of Heroes.
Information on Brilliant Chromatic Scales.
Information on the Chromatic Carapace.
Enemies have reached the door!  Move in!  We must hold!
You dare defile this holy ground?
Auction House
You want to learn how to make a campfire?  Well then you had best see Malygen in the Cenarion Enclave before you set fire to Teldrassil itself.

It is Vesprystus that you seek.  He watches over the hippogryphs that come and go from the base of Teldrassil.  You will find him through the portal in western Darnassus that will take you to Rut'theran Village.
Deeprun Tram
Study it, $N: The Catalogue of the Wayward.
RAAAAAAAR!
I'm jumpy as it is... and people insist on scaring me... Next time, though, I'll be ready!
Why do you chase me, Mechanical Yeti?! WHY?!
Oh!!! Get that thing away from me!
Umi sent you, didn't she?! She told me to expect a surprise, but I never thought that this is what she meant!
Ahhhh!!! What is that thing?!
It was Umi, wasn't it?! She's always playing jokes on me, and now she's got you in on it too!
You big meanie! Who put you up to this?
Ahhhhh!!!

While Greta focuses her energy on the recovery of Jaedenar and those who she thinks is mostly responsible for the corruption here in Felwood. I spend my time looking into the effects the corruption has had on the land.$B$BHow has it affected the creatures of the land? What must be done to end the pain of their suffering?$B$BUnfortunately, the corruption runs so deep that eternal sleep is too often the answer.
How you doin' mon!
Oh hi! My name's Sarah. What can I do for you?
The spirits told me you would come, that you would seek me for some reason, but that even you may not know that reason. So, do you know why you are here?
Your stench will attract every dragon for miles.  Tell me what you want, and quickly.
I don't want to go back to work
Whiplash
Uni-brow
Jungle Fever
Feeling underpowered
Bad hang nail
Absolutely.
Horrifying.
Continue please...
You will be ok, Awbee. Your assailants have been terminated.
Low spirits
Heya mon.  Go talk to mah Master Gadrin right over there.  Take care of that Zalazane crazy for him and I fix ya right up!
OK, OK! It's your turn!
What does Dadanga like to eat?
You threw last one, idiot. It's my turn.
My turn, meathead! I get to throw now.
Ha ha, $N! I won't ever forget the look on Daryl's face when you showed him that head!

The liquids and mixtures all bubble and spasm as you approach. Next to the equipment lies a large pair of tongs that look as though they would be adequate for dropping in samples of ooze.$B$BThere is safety gear present, but it appears to be dusty and well-ignored.$B$BDo you place some of your samples into the beakers?

Perhaps I can be of some assistance. I will make a deal with you, Satyr. I shall recover this unforged breastplate and slay the beast, Goraluk Anvilcrack. In exchange for this task, you will teach me how to create the breastplate.

He took the unforged rune covered breastplate, used in the making of the demon forged breastplate and ran away without making payment. A fool, I am not, however... the unforged chest piece is useless without knowledge or the recipe to apply said knowledge.$B$BI wonder... does he sit safely in his city of Blackrock Spire and attempt to create the item from the raw material? I know he dare not leave!
So how did he break the deal?
I would teach him how to demon forge in exchange for his soul. The soul of a Blackrock orc is worth very little but in these trying times, a soul, any soul, is better than none at all.
What deal?

You?$B$B<Lorax laughs.>$B$BThat is doubtful.$B$BI stand in these ruins and dream. Dream of the day that I catch that miserable thief, Goraluk Anvilcrack.$B$BWe had a deal, him and I. A deal that he broke. Betrayed.
Do you? Perhaps you should tell me what it is that is bothering you.
What it is that I do, of course. I brood. I lament. I hate. I plot. When that cycle is complete, I brood again. What is it you want from me? I have much on my mind.
My apologies, I did not realize that you could understand what I was saying. What is it you are doing out here?
Bite your tongue, $r, lest I rip it from your skull case and use it as a horn warmer.
You will have to excuse me, Lorax, I do not speak 'crazy.'
I do not have much time in this world, but Light willing, it is time enough to fulfill my destiny.  When you face Baron Rivendare, I will be with you.

It is good to see others who fight the Scourge in Stratholme, for it is here they are strongest.$B$BGreetings.  I am Aurius.  I was once a paladin of the Silver Hand, but like others whose faith wavered... I fell from grace.  The Scourge seduced me and nearly transformed me into a death knight!$B$BFinally sensing my peril, I fled to this chapel.  It is a sacred place, where the first paladin, Uther the Lightbringer, was ordained into the order of the Silver Hand.
Don't forget to get some Flame in a Bottle from the box here.  You're going to need it to destroy their command tent.
What have you got there, $N?$B$B<Malyfous points to the unfired plate gauntlets hanging out of your pack.>
Take a look at this, Malyfous.
Is that all?
Ah - I've been waiting for a real challenge!
I am the hand of the Lich King!
Your skulls I shall crack with all the might of Blackrock.
Come, spirits - attend your master!
To me, my servants!
Too easy.
You'll never leave this place alive.
Me feast on you all!
Explosions! MORE explosions! I got to have more explosions!
And STAY dead!
Intruders at the Service Gate! Baron Rivendare must be warned!
Chapter on Skin of Shadow.
The title of this book reads with a handwritten flourish: Maureen Dalson's Diary.
You've accepted my surrender.
Chapter on Arcane Crystals and Arcanite.
Here they come! Defend yourselves!
Chapter on Frostwhisper's Embalming Fluid.
Chapter on Enchanted Scarlet Thread.
Chapter on Frayed Abomination Stitchings.
Left Combat
Ok!
So let us pretend I get this hide, what else would you need and what could you actually make?
What are the chances of obtaining such a hide?
Tell me about the hide.
Revenge is mine!
Rawww!  Urok is dead!!  Hahah!!

The spirit looks upon you with a sense of completeness and cognizance that had not been present before.$B$B"I feel as though a great burden has been lifted from my soul.  Soon I will rest forever in peace.  I now know this, and I await this time patiently.$B$BThank you, stranger."
Hahah!  Revenge is mine!
None can stand against the Serpent Lords!
I am the serpent king! I can do anything!
The coils of death will crush you!
You will never wake the dreamer!
To Malyfous, I assume.
I'll consider that the next time I run into one of these things.
Oh?
I must know something: How did you go to the bathroom with that thing on?
So let me get this straight. You were swimming, nay, doing backstrokes in molten lava with this... this lava suit of yours? Yes? And out of nowhere, this here beast swallowed you whole?
How the hell did you get in there to begin with?

My hatred is strong <snort>, but the time is right to tell you a tale, $r.$B$BLong ago a battle took place between gods. Agamaggan, our great boar god, fell to the earth after being defeated in the War of the Ancients, his blood raining down and his bones torn asunder. <snort>$B$BGreat thorns reached up out of the earth where his blood touched the ground, and his skull adorns one of the caverns to the south.

You! $R! Come here. <snort>$B$BTime is short, and my end <snort> is near. Mangletooth shall win; you will see. <snort>$B$BMy capture can still aid <snort> my people. The Razormane tribe is more powerful than the Bristlebacks!$B$BThe Horde looks to find out who leads the raids on their people. You <snort> shall aid Mangletooth in return for the information only I know. Mangletooth can help you! <snort> But you must help Mangletooth.
Now that's putting your hoof down!
That's how it's done class!  You better be paying attention!
You surrendered.  I win.

Yes, I speak a language you understand $r.  We are not animals, yet most of your kind continues to treat us as such!  Our differences though pale to the tragedy that has befallen this land.  Please, put aside your differences with my kind and hear my dying plea.$B$BI came to this land to mend what I could, and now that will be for naught unless you can aid me.  I ask for such aid with my last breaths of life.

Please, help me $g brother : sister;...$B$BI will soon pass from this world, and though I suffer I know I shall not any more once I pass.  The wildlife though, my $g brother : sister;... the wildlife suffers too, and it knows no release.  I ask for your aid with my last breaths of life.
Well Done!
Don't let me die!
Protect me from this $N! I must return to my brood.
Help me kill $N!
Have you spoken to either of my acolytes inside the tower yet, $N? We cannot complete your orb until you've done one of their tasks. Speak to them now, if you're ready.
ROOKERY MINION death DEBUG
ROOKERY MINION SPAWN DEBUG

The felhound... a vicious creature indeed. It is not as physically strong as an infernal, but a wise warlock knows that brute force is not always the answer--if it was, you would have chosen the path of a warrior instead, wouldn't you?$B$BThe felhound draws upon the mana of its foes, using that and its quickness to overcome enemies. Its strength comes from the arcane and using that arcane power for its own ends.$B$BIf you wish to know more about infernals, then you should speak to Magaz across from me.

The infernal is one of the most powerful demons a warlock could hope to have at $Ghis:her; side in battle. The creature is stong, well-armored, and delivers devastating blows upon any foe. If you were to choose to put the spirit of an infernal into your weapon, you would gain some of those benefits--greater health and regeneration and the like.$B$BIf you wish to know more about felhounds, then you should speak to Wytula across from me.
It... is... not... the best... time, $N. I must concen... trate.
Now's not a good time, $N.$B$BAre you insane?!
Not all Forsaken are driven by Sylvanas' will, $N. Some of us are driven by true power--power we earn for ourselves.
Listen to your elders, $N. If you are strong of will and dedicated, there is no power you cannot control.
Tell Lexlort if he wants the information, all he has to do is pay! Unfortunately, that means he can't kill me if he wants the information - since I burned the battle plans and all...
This is where I get off, suckers!

Hello there, $N.  I am known as Chronormu, but you may call me Chromie.  I am comfortable with such familiarity.$B$BNow - how did I know your name, you ask?  I am one of the bronze dragonflight, forever attuned to the ebb and flow of time.  You could say that we have met before.  To that end, we shall also meet again.$B$BI hope that my choice of visual demeanor does not disturb you; while I might be charged to be a sentry of sorrowful places, I choose not to drown in the sorrow of the locale.
Place Rend's head on the stake.
Be bathed in the power of the Warchief! Drink in his might! Battle for the glory of the Horde!
The stake is covered with the remnants of those foolish enough to anger the Warchief.
18 degrees Kraklenheit. It's kind of cold, actually...
As you wish, Eitrigg.
Perhaps there exists a way?
Ah, so that is how they pushed the Dark Iron to the lower parts of the Spire.
I will take you up on that offer, Eitrigg.
Hearthglen?? But...
There is only one Warchief, Eitrigg!
Hello, Eitrigg. I bring news from Blackrock Spire.
Yes, sir. Thank you, sir!
Sir! Until my body ceases to function!
I do not deserve such praise, Warlord Goretooth.
I pray for such things.
Dreams?
What roles?
I inspect the body further.
I had to go and requisition an Abomination... an Abomination!
Maybe I should have just bought some off of Faruza?
Ah, this must be him now... no?  Bah!
As if I had all eternity.
If you want something done right, do it yourself!
At this rate I could have gathered them myself!
How long can it take to pick a handful of weeds?
What could be taking so long?
Wow, this one is just plain useless. Let me try again.
This one is slightly better than the last. However, it still suffers from the same flimsy bone structure as the others. When you summon one of these, you are on the right path.
Now this is an example of what not to summon. Look, it's frail and brittle. One good whack from a mace will send bone shards flying.
Use staff, tell Raze what do! Show Raze poacher! Raze smash!

I came to the Crossroads from the south seeking help, $c, but I find only cowards who turn their backs on me--even the mighty Thork insults me so. He is a good leader, but his dismissal of my plea causes me greater anger.$B$BHe claims my rage makes me hasty--that it clouds my judgement--but I will not rest until I have vengeance!
I want to release the corrupted saber to Winna.
Grrr...
I present to you the rabid thistle bear, Tharnariun.
Hi, $N.  No hard feelings, ok?
$N!  You're back!  And not a moment too soon!
Us hear and obey.
Our eye say you look lost.
We help you find them.
Us think you need help.
The zeppelin master
The auction house
The mailbox
The guild master
What are you looking for?
Oh, ok!  Here you are, $N.  It's the least I can do for all the help you've given me.
You're always welcome here, $N. Thanks for the laugh -- and don't worry about Daryl, he had one coming!
Get that head and it's sure to give Daryl a fright. Not that he doesn't deserve it, the bloody arrogant bastard. But ha! I can't wait to see the look on his face when you show it to him.
Do it... Do it now.
Milk me, John.
You've become quite the hunter, $N! Not only have you proven your skills, you also bested Daryl, which gets you extra points in my book!$B$BYou're welcome here any time.
Here at the Farstrider lodge, we prize hunting skills above all else. Wish to gain my approval? You'll have to earn it.$B$BYou look up to the challenge, $Glad:lass;!

Though I hate to admit it, the bear did get the better of me. My oh my, that's one big ol' bear!$b$bNonetheless, if you can take that bear down, it'd be a feat to be proud of! It gave more than a few of our best hunters some trouble.$b$b<He claps you on the back.>$b$bBest the bear and we'll accept you as a regular member of the Farstrider Lodge.
Oh, it's on now! Bet you thought I'd be alone too, huh?!
Gryfe do his job! Gryfe go now!!!
What did Gryphe tell boss?? Gryphe wasn't lying! There she is, trying to steal battle plans!

Imagination is the limit my friend, if you can figure out how to smith it then you can make it, box it, and ship it to retailers all over the world. Of course, then you have to deal with marketing. Tell you what, let's just stick with the smithing part for now, ok?
Are you kidding me? You must be kidding me! Either that or you think I'm a clown here to amuse you. Is that what you think? That I'm a clown? Huh, is it! You think I'm a clown don't you!
Yeah? Of course I'm a smith. What, you think Dwarves are the only ones worth their weight in anvils? Fine, be that way. Go get a dwarf to help you!
Still a bit weak, unbalanced, unsure. Not your work youngling, I am speaking of you! Now, are you ready to be shaped into a real smith or not?
This isn't a game you toy with youngling! Go, speak with Snarl outside. He may be a serpent in my lair but he does know his way around an anvil.

I can't say enough about yer work, truly amazing things that ye can do with a hammer and an anvil. Now, don't be tellin anyone that I suggested ye go find a goblin to teach ye but that's exactly what I'm gonna do. Brikk Keencraft is his name, and last I heard he was operating a shop down in Booty bay.
Looks like ye may have the makings of a great smith. But before I teach ye anything I need to know that ye've got what it takes.
I'm sorry $g lad : lass; but ye just don't have the foundation to learn what I have to teach. But don't fret, go speak with my student Rotgath, he'll help ye out.
Perhaps you have what it takes, perhaps not. If you do then I will take you on and teach you what you wish to know. If you do not... well, I'll just leave it at that.
You waste my time, go talk with my student Basil.
You are now ready to follow the path that joins your life with my own, if only for a short time. However we must make sure that you understand the things of which the spirits speak.

You have great potential, but you must achieve understanding first, you must accept the spirits and listen to their calling. Only then will you be prepared for the path you must follow. Go speak with Thrag, I think perhaps you can learn a lot from one another.
Join me, together we will weave the spirits of the forge and find the true shape that the metal seeks.
Tell me, do your feel prepared to face the challenge I have laid out for you? The spirits tell me that you will pass, but do you have faith in them or in yourself?
You need to heed the guidance of the spirits a little better young one. Your path lies with another, Thrag Stonehoof in Thunder Bluff. Perhaps you can learn something from one another.
The spirits have brought you to me, and so I feel blessed by them.
Hmm? Oh yes, I can teach you something if you desire. But stay away from Sumi and Tumi, they are not for the likes of you. Saru only let's those of great skill approach his daughters.

So you think you are good enough to learn from me? The great Snarl? You are no more than a lowly worm beneath my boot. However, taking on an underling might make me seem more appealing to Sumi and Tumi. Let's see what meager skills you possess.
Come to me again with such pathetic work and I will send you home in a small iron box that I tempered in goat urine. Now go see that idiot Ug'thok, he is better suited to your needs.
Stay away from Sumi and Tumi. They are....spoken for.
If I prove myself to Saru he will have no choice but to let me fight for one of his daughters. Then we will see who is sneering.

Now I'm the one who feels rough around the edges, I honestly don't think there's anything left I can teach you. But you know who can? Bengus Deepforge in Ironforge, now there's a dwarf that knows his steel. Go look him up in The Great Forge of Ironforge, see if he's up to having a new trainee under him.
You do fine work, but it's a bit rough around the edges. Don't worry about it, it will come with practice. Speaking of which, how about we see what you've been working on?

Yeah, I've heard through the grapevine that I might be seeing you sooner or later. But I don't just take on anyone, I need to make sure you have what it takes first. You willing to take my little test and find out?

Hmm, your work is allright but it's nowhere near the quality I look for in a student. Go talk with Smith Argus in Goldshire, I'm sure he can teach you some basics. Then when you're done, come on back to me and I'll give you a little test to make sure you are ready.
Ever since the shadows claimed Duskwood I haven't been able to sleep. I am kept awake by the ghostly sounds of screaming on the breeze. It sounds almost like lambs screaming, and they won't stop.
Don't come out of the shadows like that. Next time give a girl some warning.
Yer skill is not without merit, but I need to put one last test to ye before I take ye on.
Sorry $g lad : lass;, ye aren't quite up to the challenge of learning from me. Go see my son Groum, it would make his day to get a new apprentice.

The life of a smith is not an easy one, but it puts steel in yer bones and fire in yer heart. My da' was a smith, my grandfather before him in the forges beneath Grim Batol. And now my son follows in our footsteps, that boy makes me proud.

I said ye had the blood of a blacksmith in ye, and I was right. Go to Ironforge, to The Great Forge, and find yerself a Dwarven smith by the name of Bengus Deepforge. My teacher, and one of the greatest smiths I've ever known.
Ye have some skill about ye with hammer and anvil, but not enough. Go speak to Dane Lindgren, he'll get ye ready to learn what I have to teach ye.
Aye, it appears as if ye have learned quite a bit, I'm impressed. But do ye know how many I have that seek to be my apprentice? Tell ye what, do a small task fer me and I'll take ye on.
You merely destroy an image, fool. I shall hunt you until the end of days.
But for now, your death will have to suffice...
Vaelastrasz, when this world belongs to the black flight, your flight shall know its end.
When I get all shaken up, hear me shout...
Didn't even leave his boots behind...
OZZIE!!!! OH NO!
Um, Ozzie... that doesn't look very safe.
This should do it! At least it better do it!
You will suffer in this defeat, Nefarian!
You have come too far to fail. Stand back, mortals.
Ah am very surprised that one wit such a careless nature has gotten dis far...$B$BYah, you may have another charm, but Mau'ari is very displeased wit your actions!$B$BGo, now.
I lost the Cache of Mau'ari. What can I do?

E'ko is da unfocused form of the supernatural power, and Juju is da concentrated essence. By using a stong incantation, I can transform da E'ko into Juju.  Once it becomes Juju, you can den use the Cache of Mau'ari ta reflect da powers onto yourself.
What is Juju?
You must continue! Their resolve is weakening. Drink from my power and be renewed once again!
You are not trying to kill the anvil with your hammer, you are trying to create a weapon to kill your foes with. Let me show you what you are doing wrong.
I hope to one day forge weapons and armor from the bones of my enemies.
Ah yes, another who will stoke the fires and forge the weapons of war. Of course I will teach you how.
Your interruption is costing me valuable time, this had better be good.
All is not lost! Battle these beasts without fear. Your wounds I shall heal, bones I shall mend. Be renewed, heroes!

Karn says we need to listen to the spirits of the forge and of the steel, that they will guide us. I hear nothing but a ringing in my ears. Here, take a hammer and let us try to hear the spirits together.
I listen and I listen but I don't hear these spirits that Karn speaks of.

I can show you what you wish to know, but you must be patient. Take your time to work the steel and feel the way it shapes beneath your hammer. When you become one with the steel, then you will understand.
Snarl calls me simple because I am too slow. I just want to do the job right, and that takes time.
Just swinging a hammer at an anvil doesn't make you a smith. Give me that and let me teach you something before you embarrass us all.
I hear one comment about waterfowl, and you will be eating through a tube.
You're not bad, but let me show you a few tricks you might find handy.
Do I look like I have the time to spend jawin?

I don't admit this lightly, but you are a far better smith than I am. If you want to learn more than my meager teachings then I suggest you seek out a Dwarf named Therum Deepforge in Stormwind. You will find him in the Dwarven District.
Of course I can help you with training. I'm just a journeyman myself, but I'm sure there's something I can show you.
The creatures in Winterspring are a good place ta start.$B$BHoweva', der may also be other places you can look...
Where should I look for E'ko?
Ye've got a little skill on ye. Enough to learn ye a few things I wager. Let's see what I can teach ye, shall we?
Eh? I don't have time ta chat, my da' wants me ta finish this order fer him.

Ye learn fast $g lad : lass;, much faster than I can keep up with. If ye want ta continue yer training, I suggest ye see my teacher. His name's Rotgath, Rotgath Stonebeard and ye'll find him in Ironforge at The Great Forge.
Here for training eh? Just began my training meself, but I would be glad ta teach ye what I can.
Good day to ye $g lad : lass;. Can I be of service?
The Blackhand legion shall wear your skin as fashion accessories!
You actually believed that you stood a chance?
Served!
Do not consume the entire corpse just yet, children! Save room for dessert!
Consider yourself lucky, mortal. At least your corpse is still somewhat presentable.
I want those boots! Nobody touch that corpse!
That will surely save me some work.
The mortals have fallen! The new age of the Blackrock legion is at hand!
This will work -- keep heading through this gap.  The path to Un'Goro is due west of here once we round these infernal bugs.
That was not what I would call 'escort friendly'.  I will find a way to go around these things.  Let's move to the south, toward that rock.  Maybe we can wedge through it and still avoid the ogres.
What the... what are those things crawling at us?  We... we have incoming!
This doesn't look... right.  Look at how alien the desert is!  Going through here might be a terrible mistake.
Whoa, whoa, hold up Dadanga girl.
The Tanaris desert is littered with gigantic bones just like this one to my right.  I'd hate to have ever ran across that thing.
As nice as Gadgetzan is compared to Un'Goro, I have some good folks counting on us to bring them some supplies.  If you're ready to go, then so are Dadanga and I.  Let's mount up!

Da Cache of Mau'ari holds great secrets... The shards used ta make it are reflective, and you can use its shiny surface ta siphon power from other tings and den reflect it onto yourself.$B$BKeeping da charm in your inventory lets you collect e'ko, da spiritual power from the beasts you fight. Once you find e'ko, you bring it ta Mau'ari.
What is E'ko?

They took off for Gadgetzan a while ago to bring us back some supplies.  Frankly, I would have given at least four of my fingers to have had the chance to crawl inside one of Dadanga's packs in order to leave this forsaken place.
Have you seen Petra or Dadanga around?
I'm gonna need some help with this $N!
Look out, incoming!
It was quite a haul, but now I can load up on supplies for the trip back into the Crater.  I should be able to unload some of this exotic cargo as well.
We're finally here, thanks to you $N!  Without your help, we would have been some over-grown lizard's lunch!
There it is -- Gadgetzan!  We're in the home stretch now!
Come on Dadanga!  March girl, march!
Blast... ogres.  I forgot about these buffoons.  There's no easy way around them, so expect plenty of fighting.  Look sharp!
More and more of Kalimdor is turning into the twisted landscape to our left, and the critters who dwell within are NOT friendly.  Watch your step.
I can stand no more of this!
I will tear off your limbs and use them to beat you into submission!
It appears as if I will have to step in and take care of you myself.
You will learn of the sanctuary only death can offer...
Flee while you still have a chance, mortals. You will pray for a swift death should I enter the arena.
Curse you, mortal.
I promise you an eternity of dung clean up duty for that failure!
Sssplendid... Then let us watch as my children tear these mortals to pieces.
How do I use the Cache of Mau'ari?
Many times my blades have felled my target before they even drew near. The secret is in the flick of your wrist.
Ah, $r... I possess great knowledge a' da world and how ta create charms a' great power.
The skill of the bow is a great asset to anyone, not just the hunter. You can strike swiftly, silently, and before your prey can blink... they are dead.
Many think the staff an inferior weapon. I challenge any who think so to prove their strength against my staff.
I do not know this Eye of the Tiger some speak of, but I can show you how to use the claws of the tiger.
You want a weapon that acts as an extension of your very fist? Yes, I believe I can show you something.
So, you wish to learn more about our elven weaponry? Let your first lesson begin.
The secret to the knife is to keep it hidden until the moment you strike.
The slow blade penetrates the shield.
A hidden blade up the sleeve can mean the difference between you laying dead in the alley, and your opponent laying face down in his own blood.
Zoom, zing, and BAM! He may have had a huge two handed cleaver made from a boat anchor but after a few well placed slices from my dinner knife, he was the one going crash!
Lets go, $N. I am ready to reach Whitereach Post.
Modernization is the key. With a crank and a lever you can fire this baby with the power of an ogre pulling a normal bow.
The chromatic flight shall deal with these intruders. Let us talk of more pressing matters.
Och I love a good brawl, but sometimes yer foe has a skull thicker than a Thorium heat shield. Times like that ye need a wee bit o assistance.

See this? This is my boom stick! Dwarven top of the line. That's right, this sweet baby was made in Ironforge, Khaz Modan. Retails for about one hundred and nine gold, ninety five copper. It's got a walnut stock, thorium steel, and a hair trigger.
Hound on the horizon moving at thirty feet per second. The only question is, right or left eye. That's right $g lad : lass;, I'm that good.
I'll teach ye to chop down yer foes like saplings in the forest.
A good hammer in yer hands makes the world feel safer. Like ye can face even the mightiest of foes with a large hunk of solid metal gripped in yer fists.
If you think I'm good, you should see my husband fight.
I've seen farmers with staves hold off trained soldiers. Do not ever underestimate the power and skill it takes to wield one of these properly.
Sure it takes longer to reload but this baby will punch a hole the size of my fist through any set of armor.
Sure I can teach you the fine art of wielding a polearm, but it's gonna cost you.

I can teach you both the finesse of a short blade and the bone shattering cleaving power of a two handed behemoth. Or we can get crazy and I can teach you both, could come in handy for when the situation changes on ya.
The next clutch is due to hatch soon, sire. We will be ready to launch the attacks by week's end.
Then we must not waste anymore time. Are the chromatic dragonflight ready?
They have freed the human, Windsor, sire. It will not be long until Onyxia is uncovered.
What of the Alliance, Rend?

Ah, one of my favorite customers. You look to be of a warlock of some power, $N. I am pleased to meet you. If there is anything I can do for you, please, just ask.$B$BMy brother and I feel that it will be your kind who lead us into the next great era. One with such power... such control... it's only a matter of time before the Legion itself bends to your will.$B$BI am but a little envious.
Welcome to my shop, $c. What is it the Goodstitch brothers can do for you?
The long reload takes some getting used to, but nothing else is better for starting off a fight.
Swift and sure. Cut a tendon here, slit an artery there. I can show you how to turn any knife into a perfect killing machine.
Keep your foes at bay and carve them into cutlets at the same time. The only problem is that the long shaft keeps me from getting blood on my hands.
The only weapon I know of that has no use other than killing someone. Not something, but someone. These blades were invented to end the lives of men. Beautiful aren't they?
Nuttin' be 'fraid of. Come.
Just a stick? Want me to show you what 'just a stick' can do?
It may look simple, a large stick with a huge weight on the end. But when swung with the might of a tauren behind it, this stick can break stone walls.
Never had much use for a bow, but these rifles the goblins make are very handy when hunting. Still can't get used to the smell though.
Dis ain't no game mon. Joo want to use da axe, joo got to say da line. Say it wif me... "Say hello, to ma little friend."
A bow is a great ting ma friend. Joo jus have to take care of it, and it will take care of joo.
Joo may tink this ma walkin stick mon. Dat's jus wat I want joo to tink.
The fists of an Orc are already a powerful weapon, so why not add blades or studs of solid steel. Now the fists I use to tame the wolves of the plains I can also use to shatter the armor of my foes.
Come to learn have ya, mon?
We have used bows since before even my father's time. They are solid and sure and take down our foes swiftly. I see no reason to use the guns that the goblins and tauren seem so fond of.
Take tha blade like dis, den throw. Just flip joo wrist mon, one twirl and joo got jooself lunch.
It's small but it does it's job if you know what you are doing. Let me show you just the right places to hit.
What do you mean you don't know how to use an axe?
Enough! Playtime is over!
At last, I have caught up with you, Nefarian. Surely you did not think you would escape the might of the other Aspects?
Ah, $r, you have returned!
Begone, mortal. You are not worthy of my knowledge.
I have discerned the path that you must take. Are you prepared?
As you wish, Vaelan.
It will be done.
I will do my best, Vaelan.
I am willing to try but I will require instruction.
Unless?
Why not destroy them with the combined might of the Aspects?
Where he left off?
Demon Soul?
No, Vaelan, I do not.
Please.
Your kind?

In decades past - of now ancient wars and conflicts - our kind was driven to the brink of extinction. Much we have endured, $r.$B$BThe onslaught of the Burning Legion. The Demon Soul. The Aspects divided. The ascension of Deathwing. The enslavement of our Queen, Alexstrasza, by the Dragonmaw.$B$BThrough it all, we have been the unshakable will of the dragons - the undaunted force that has fought to represent our waning existence in this world.
Good. You are showing promise to join the elite ranks. Now, more practice.
Gnomes can be hard to hit due to their size. However, they have a pinchant for dancing around and thrusting their hips. When they do this, strike at them like so...
Dwarves will spin around leaving their backs open for attack at times. Take this opportunity to strike like this...
Night Elves like to stand off on one leg while casting. Strike at that leg like so...
Now, you try.
Humans are usually vunerable on their left side between the 4th and 5th rib. Let's practice striking at this area like so...

Ah, a fellow warlock who has proven $ghis:her; worth to some degree.$B$BI am pleased to meet your acquaintance. My name is Menara Voidrender... and not without just cause.$B$BYou seem powerful and well-learned enough that other tools... more powerful tools... would be welcome and not foolishly imparted. If this is true, then speak to me further. If not, well then, you know your way  back to the docks and off into the ocean.

Kar Aman, $N. You look to be a strong $c--you would do well to mind yourself in this area. Touching things you know nothing about, or showing disrespect to your elders is just cause for punishment.$B$BYou may not respect me or my companions, but you will learn to respect our power if you prove foolish enough.$B$BNow, enough with the pleasantries, was there something I can do for you?
May your skills in smelting dark iron serve you well, $N.  But do not let your knowledge corrupt you... as it corrupted us.
I'm going back to the Rookery, Tinkee.  I need an Eggscilliscope!
Hi $N!$B$BI have to work on my devices, but eventually... I'm going to need someone to get me dragon eggs!
Hello, $N. Welcome to Refuge Pointe.
Kibler is being investigated by G.E.T.A.
Bijou lost! SQUAWK! *cough*
Ask Kibler about the treasure! SQUAWK!
SQUAWK!! *cough* *cough* I need to quit smoking!
The plans are in there!
Watch my back, this could get real messy.
Do you need assistance?
...pan fried, deep fried, and stir fried...
Gubber, I don't have a fishing pole.
Gubber, I don't know how to fish.
Greetings $g lad : lass;, if you're looking for the best deals you'll find outside of Ironforge itself, then you've come to the right place.

<Volcor doesn't look at you at all as you get close to him. He seems to be concentrating on keeping his bandages from falling off. After a moment, he looks up at you, a little startled.>$B$BOh, sorry, $c. Now's not a good time. I hope you understand.

My brother and I have dedicated ourselves to Sylvanas. She is our beacon of light when times were darkest. We sacrifice ourselves day in and day out to ensure our kind overcome the destiny that's chosen us.$B$BWe will not remain weak. We will take that which is owed to us. We will return tenfold, the pain that was done to us. And we shall do so with smiles on our faces.
Look for the Zeppelin Landing Tower outside of the city to the southeast.
Just outside the city's main gate is a signpost.  It will point you toward the zeppelin tower.  Speak to Zeppelin Master Frezza at the top of the tower.
What do you think of Dadanga?

All right then... I know the way to and from Gadgetzan.  What I need for you to do is to keep the beasts off of us.  I've trained Dadanga how to defend herself pretty well, but we can't handle the overgrown madness out there for long.  Let me know when you're ready to go, $N.
Yes $gbrother : sister;, how may I assist you?
If you're ready, then Dadanga and I are ready.  Let's go!

I welcome you to Theramore, $N.$B$BI apologize for being abrupt and not having a lot of time to exchange pleasantries, but my city must come first. Too many things threaten our way of life and the sanctity of the Alliance. I must stay ever vigilant against forces outside of our control if I'm to ensure my people remain safe and happy.$B$BPerhaps we'll have more time to speak later.
Ah, the true sign of the hunter!  To stalk one's prey in the never-ending game of life.  Look to Drayl on the Hunter Rise for your answers.
You, in harmony with nature, and only your skills to survive.  This is the way that the Earth Mother intended it to be.  You will want to find Bale on the Hunter Rise.
This $N has been driven mad from the corruption!
This creature suffers from the effects of the fel... We must end its misery.
I sense the taint of corruption upon this $N. Help me destroy it!
That has to be the biggest $N I have ever seen... and it's coming right for us!
Dadanga!  Attack!
Get away from my kodo, you freak of nature!
Leave me now in peace. I must rest.
$N, you have disturbed me from my rest!
Step lively Dadanga!  Come on, girl!  The quicker we get through here, the happier we'll both be.
Well, we're not getting any closer just standing here.  Come on Dadanga!  Yah!
Come to the aid of the Throne!

I bid you welcome, $c. Rare do we have visitors down to these levels of the Apothecarium... unless of course there's something someone wants... or needs.$B$B<Chemist Coely laughs.>$B$BHow can I help you today, hmm?

It'll definitely not be anywhere in the Eastern Kingdoms, that's for sure.$B$BIt'll have to be somwhere on Kalimdor, but still far enough away from the Horde and other races. Someplace unaffected by the Sundering--that means no where near the Night elves' civilization either.$B$BI would guess it'd be someplace protected also... like a valley, or a crater. I don't know. I'm just guessing now. I'm sorry I couldn't help you more.
Are there any areas you can think of that would be so untouched?

A pure sample would be one that's uncorrupted by unintentional influences. We need to find the creatures in the most basic, normal environment we can.$B$BThat means somewhere devoid of civilization or the effects of the dominant races of Azeroth. Someplace... untouched.
What do you mean by "pure?"

No, not that I can tell. It seems to be mostly based on region. Some races have labled them slimes, some oozes. It seems to be preference mostly.$B$BEvery time I've encountered ooze, sludge, or slime they have basically been the same creatures. The differences seem to be based on their environment, which is why we need a pure sample.
Is there a difference between ooze and slime?
There must be someplace on Azeroth that we can find oozes uncorrupted by the Scourge or anything else. But where?!

Look at these samples! What does it mean? What does it mean? I'm going to need time, time to look at all this information. And I'll need more information. Information I can't get... damn! Think, Laris, think!$B$BWhat are you going to do? What?!$B$BThere has to be a solution!
Here it is -- the Tanaris desert.  Funny how an inhospitable place like this looks better than a lush jungle once you've been trapped in it forever.
Here's the path out of Un'Goro!  We made it!  All we have to worry about is the Tanaris desert now.
Here's the eastern mountain wall!  I'm cutting towards the south now; try and keep up.  We're not out of the thick of it yet!
This is where things get interesting.  My plan is to follow the mountail wall, keeping it to our left.  That way, we won't get lost in the jungle and we'll cut down on the hostiles.  You ready?
Image dissipation in sixty seconds.

Amazing, aren't they? All these artifacts and remains.$B$BI'm not sure what I'm more impressed by, their size, or the stories that go along with them. There's so much to study and learn. And the connections we can make...$B$BDid you know rumor has it that many races have the same heritage as Night elves?
I present to you the Libram of Voracity.
I present to you the Libram of Resilience.
I present to you the Libram of Tenacity.
I present to you the Libram of Constitution.
Let me grab the popped corn kernels, sire.
Aright *hic*... Say, you look familiar *hic*. Have I ever told you about the time me and Windsor fought off thir, er... a thous... a million orcs?$B$BOh settle down friend, this is a good one!
Tell me a story, John.
You'll have to give me a moment, $c, the naga are attacking us right now. I'll speak to you as soon as the attack is done!
Um... sorry to bother you, but could I see Goodsteel's ledger again... if you're not using it.
You take care of yourself! I'm gettin' out o' here.
Ach! Thank you so much, $N! I'm free! Finally!
Speak with Regthar.  He is wise and can help you find what you seek.

I have observed four different kinds of plants that have been affected by the corruption: the songflower, the windblossom, the whipper root, and the night dragon plant.  The songflower and windblossom are common plants in Felwood, while the whipper root and night dragon are seen less frequently.  All are a vital part of Felwood's ecosystem.
What plants are in Felwood that might be corrupted?

Not a creature in the forest can elude Corand, such is his skill at tracking.  You would do well to listen to his teachings if you wish to be even half as successful.  

I will relieve you of the burden of tracking him and mark his location on your map, there in the Cenarion Enclave.
Tracking

If you need help surviving in the woods, you had best not stray far from the city walls.  However if you do plan to stray, then you had better have a talk with Malygen in the Cenarion Enclave so that you might learn to set a proper campfire.
Survival

"A skill for those who wish to overcome obstacles."  I believe that is how Faelyssa describes her skill set.  

If you believe as she does then find your way to the Cenarion Enclave in the northern section of Darnassus where she conducts her class.
Lockpicking
Vesprystus' hippogryphs will bear you swiftly to your destination.  Seek him out in Rut'theran Village, through the portal which lies in the western section of Darnassus.
Hippogryph Master
Thank you for clearing out those foolish senators.  Now prepare to meet your doom at the hands of Ragnaros' most powerful servant.
I need help in defeating the shadowsilk poachers.

Hello, $N. Should you require assistance in completing your mission, you have only to ask. My guardian, Raze, can assist you in defeating the shadowsilk poachers. Use this Staff of Command to command Raze in battle. He is trained to ONLY attack shadowsilk poachers.
NO SERVICE!!
You have outworn your welcome!
You must leave the bar!
I would like to train further in the ways of the Light.

Greed has led you back to me.$B$B<Mathredis laughs.>$B$BA wise Draenei once told me that it - greed - is the single quality that all of the races on this world share. I would have to agree.$B$BHave you collected the components listed within the libram?
A rare find, indeed.$B$B<Mathredis nods.>$B$B If you wish to continue, I will need the components.
Give me the arcana and I shall craft the amalgamation, mortal.
<Mathredis gazes intently at the libram.>$B$BYou come for an amalgamation? Have you done as the libram instructed?
Ah, so... you have found it.$B$B<Mathredis points to the book in your possession.>$B$BHave you collected the necessary components?$B$BThe manifestations listed in the libram, imbecile!
I present to you the Libram of Rumination.

They are lost, $r. Librams written by the elven masters. Scattered across the world when the Scourge was unleashed upon Quel'Thalas.$B$BNow we search for these librams. Search to find the secrets they hold - to restore power once had.$B$BI search for the ten written by Master Kariel Winthalus. Should you find a libram, allow me to absorb its magical properties and for you I shall craft an amalgamation of power... of course, all things come at some cost. You will find my cost to be high; but pay you shall.
Oh, no! We've run out of time.
I'm getting out of here!
Uh oh!  I'm out of here!
You'll pay for that!
Hey!  What's gives?
I regret that I must fight this $N.
I have destroyed my Azsharite weaponry! I need your assistance in defeating the triad of power.
Doesn't anybody KNOCK anymore???!
The door is open, Kharan. You are a free man.
Continue...
I need another sparkling stone.
The large shrine was built many years ago by the night elves that once inhabited this land.$B$BWhat secrets could it hold?
I bet you're sorry now, aren't you $N!?!
This is gonna leave a mark!
Administering fists of fury on $N!
I summon you, Sha'ni Proudtusk!
I need a Cenarion beacon.
Box stupid. Lumurk sleepy.
Lumurk open this box easy!
Grurk stupid? You try open box! Maybe you smart as gnome???
Let me try! You too stupid!
Stupid box! Stupid, stupid box! OPEN! GRURK SAY YOU OPEN!
Grurk open soon. Then we split treasure.
Get out of here, Tobias, you're free!
Did Crest send you?
You're free, Dughal! Get out of here!
HELP!!!!

"Darnassae?"$B$BThe night elf druid looks at you expectantly, but it is clear you cannot verbally communicate with her.  Undaunted, she points to herself and smiles.  She points at you and smiles once more.  She finally motions several times down the path to the north.$B$BPerhaps she is indicating that there is a druid you can speak to further up the road?

These once beautiful woods suffer under a terrible curse!  Corrupting forces twist the life here into shadows of their former selves.  If you are not an agent of this corruption, then perhaps you can aid me in reclaiming Felwood!

"Taurahe?"$B$BThe tauren druid looks at you expectantly, but it is clear you cannot verbally communicate with her.  Undaunted, she points to herself and smiles.  She points at you and smiles once more.  She finally motions several times down the path to the south.$B$BPerhaps she is indicating that there is a druid you can speak to further down the road?
Is that you, my dear Tobias???
Ah, just in time for your cleansing, $r. I shall wax the impurities from your soul.
What manner of filth dares enter my chambers!?
You make perfect little hat, $r!

You see the faint outline of a humanoid figure inside the pod; you now know that this is indeed the location you need to be at.  While you think you will eventually be able to open the pod, it remains tighly shut even to your most forceful attempts to open it.
I lost my Crystal Pylon User's Manual and need another one.
Tell me more about the Western Crystal Pylon.
Tell me more about the Northern Crystal Pylon.
Who is this Lar'korwi you spoke of?
Tell me more about the Eastern Crystal Pylon.
Where is Un'Goro Crater?

Un'Goro Crater be far to the south of Kalimdor. Beyond the Thousand Needles in Tanaris. Look for the large floating stones... they mark the entrance to the Crater. But be careful... it is no easy path. The raptors are not far from the entrance.

Greetings, $c. For some, the hunter is a way of life, a chosen profession. For others, it is something of a pastime, a badge of courage, or a rite of passage depending on your tribe.$B$BFor me, race and profession mean nothing--it is the testing of your spirit and mind that I respect. For one to stand against the forces of nature and test all of their skills is the true mark of honor.$B$BIf you wish to test yourself and earn my respect, then speak to me more.
Transcribe the tablet.
Come with me if you want to live.
Sweet Elune, thanks for getting me out of that... thing!

You probably weren't expecting to find me in this cave, were you?$B$BMy name's J.D., and I really can't tell you much about how I got here, but what I can tell you is that this cave is my home now!$B$BI spend my time studying the strange crystals that can be found all over the crater.
I need help!
Help!
A-Me, home. A-Me go home! $N, no stop A-Me.
Danger. Danger! $N try hurt A-Me.
$N, no hurt A-Me. A-Me, good.
Bad, $N. $N, bad!
I want to examine this pylon.
The Crystal Pylons of Un'Goro are a mystery to all. To the few inhabitants here, they are a source of legend, with much speculation as to their purpose.
I have suffered, but now I can feel it slowly fading from me. I feel... free.

Tracking is it?  Then Denmul Farmountain is the one you should pay a visit to.  He'll teach ye the tricks of the trade like no other.  

Just head south from the gates of Ironforge to The Military District to find him.

Tresa Farmountain has seen her share of bad weather, but with her knowledge of Survival skills she's come through with her spirits high.  

She's over in The Military Ward south of the gates of Ironforge if you wish to speak with her.
Durtham Greldon over in The Forlorn Cavern can teach ye the in's and out's of lockpicking.  Just don't be practicing any of those in's or out's here in Ironforge, if ye understand my meaning.
Bank of Ironforge
What do ye need directions to?
IF they say... IF!  There are no if's about Ironforge!  Eh?  What now?
I love the smell of Ironforge in the morning!  Eh? And what would you be needing $c?
Help me with this $N!
Aid me! $N draws near!
You are deemed a threat!
Phalanx, I think you need to teach thos person a lesson.
Hey!  Stop that!
Do you have any mithril casings?

Hmm, I don't have any mithril casings. I'm all out. Is that all you need to get to fix A-Me? Oh, that would be fantastic!$B$BMithril casings aren't too hard to find back in civilization. Just ask any skilled engineer to make one for you. I think it takes a few bars of mithril, but if you could help me out, I'll make sure you're well rewarded!
If you're going to venture into Blackrock Depths, come speak with me. I may have some work for you.
Another Engineer! Hey, this is a great chance for me to show off some new gadgets I've been building!
Thanks again, $N.  Rocknot and I are really hitting it off!
Why don't you and Rocknot go find somewhere private...
Thanks, Ragged John. Your story was very uplifting and informative.
The corruption of Felwood has trapped my spirit here... I may never rest...
Ahhh... Ironfoe.
You may leave me here -- I wish to be alone in my final moments.
Your knowledge is lacking.  Return to me when your skills in smelting have grown!
300? So the Dark Irons killed him and dragged him into the Depths?
WHY is he in Blackrock Depths?
Ok, so where the hell is he? Wait a minute! Are you drunk?
So how did he die?
So that's how Windsor died...
Interesting... continue, John.
Ironfoe?
Start making sense, dwarf. I don't want to have anything to do with your cracker, your pappy, or any sort of 'discreditin.'
So what did you do?
Official business, John. I need some information about Marshal Windsor. Tell me about the last time you saw him.
Thank you for your time, Lady Prestor.

Of course not, dear $g boy:girl;. You 'adventurer' types are often victims of circumstance; subject to the political drama which tends to unfold between citizenry and royalty.$B$BMy advice to you, then, is to seek out something else, more specifically: A new career.$B$BThis world has enough heroes.
Begging your pardon, Lady Prestor. That was not my intent.
You seek to lower our global defenses in order to appease a paranoid magistrate and an encampment of riff-raff that are most probably suffering from heat stroke.
My apologies, Lady Prestor.
I was standing right next to you, imbecile. I know what you seek.
Pardon the intrusion, Lady Prestor, but Highlord Bolvar suggested that I seek your advice.
<Lady Prestor glares at you.>
I'd like to train in cooking.
Hey Nag, how about you slice me off a piece of that...
Mistress, you tell Plugger that I want more of his ale.  I can't get enough!
Nagmara!  Have any mutton left?
Yes $gsir:madam;.
I'll bring it right over, baby...
Coming right up!

I am a mage of great power, I have spent my days studying the mind and the memory as it pertains to learning and the retention of learned abilities. I would even now be perfecting my studies if not for the great voices that came to me in the night, informing me that my services were required. I will be here for only a short time offering my ability to wipe your talents for free. Soon I will leave again, and you will once more be stuck with whatever choices you make.
Help me choose wisely.
You're good for nothing, Ribbly.  It's time to pay for your wickedness!
Your family says hello, Ribbly.  And they want your head!
It's GO TIME! Come get sum! <replace this>
Intruders!!
Welcome to Camp Mojache, brave $c.  How may I assist you this day?
All right, I think I can make it on my own from here.  I don't know who you are... but I owe you one.  Thank you!
I like the way you think!  Let's get outta here!
Oh man, I thought I was dead for sure.  Ugh... still dizzy...
Thanks, $N! You're the hero of Un'Goro Crater!
I... I'm not really sure how I got here...$B$BI seem to remember traveling... a raft...$B$B
Grark Lorkrub, you have been charged and found guilty of treason against the Horde. How you plead is unimportant. High Executioner Nuzrak, step forward.
Kneel, Grark.
Our foes will fall!
Beware!  The Kolkar attack!
The invaders are here!
Defend the bunkers!
I am here!  Your rule of this land is over!
You two-legs are nothing!  My children could beat you!
The Kolkar are the strongest!
Shake in fear, dogs!  I am here!
Your Horde is nothing to the Kolkar!
The Kolkar will rule!
The worst is yet to come, $r.
You will not defile our sacred land!
I doubt you will be so lucky the next time you encounter my bretheren.
You have shown me your desire, and have payed with precious stone.  I will teach you...
I have payed your price, Gloom'rel.  Now, teach me your secrets!
Your will is strong, and your intent is clear.$B$BPerhaps you are worthy...
You wish to learn the old craft?  You wish to smelt dark iron?$B$BAppease me, $r.  Show me a sacrifice and I will consider it!
Gloom'rel, tell me your secrets!
Your bondage is at an end, Doom'rel.  I challenge you!
I am forever denied the touch of stone.  I will never again know the glory of shaped iron...
I am one of the Seven, and it is our doom to stand sentry.  Forever.
Look fierce!  You are Kolkar, so act like one!
Be alert!  The orcs and their allies are close!
Stand straight!  Your weakness sickens me!
I'd like to purchase more Tharlendris seeds.

Yes, but you'll find it more rewarding if you have skill in herbalism!  You'll be nurturing and cultivating special seeds.  While the Evergreen Pouch you'll receive allows even a novice to grow something, those who show some aptitude in herbalism will have more bountiful results.
I'm not a journeyman herbalist -- am I able to still assist you in your work?
Ahh... My experiments never seem to work out right. Maybe I should go back downstream.
I know it'll work this time... My last 13 tries were just practice!
Now, if I add the yellow ones...
This will be my best experiment yet!
Pelver
Ofgut
Zimrel
Uggel
Bethek
Vorfalk
Face me, if you dare!
How can I get Evoroot?
I have given you all the knowledge I have, $N. May luck be with you.
Please, leave an old spirit in peace.
Lok'tar Ogar!
What!?
What do you want?
You lost?
Where is Warlord Krom'zar?
Good thing someone here has tracking!  Look for Shim'la in the Hunter's Hall in the Valley of Honor.
Track down Shim'la at the south entrance to the Hunter's Hall in the Valley of Honor.
Denni'ka can show you how to keep warm.  Look for her at Survival of the Fittest, a hut on the shore of the lake next to the Spirit Lodge.  Head up above and west of the Valley of Strength.

I prefer my food raw, but if you like yours cooked Denni'ka can show you how to light a fire.  Find her at Survival of the Fittest, a hut on the shore of the lake next to the Spirit Lodge.  Look for it up above and to the west of the Valley of Strength.
You have a treasure chest?  Let me see!  Alright, find Zando'zan in the Cleft of Shadow.  Look for the tunnel going down in The Drag to find it.
Go find Zando'zan in the Cleft of Shadow.  There are a couple of tunnels leading down into that cavern, one just south of the Valley of Wisdom and the other in The Drag.
I am ready!
Be alert, you lazy mules!

<Cyrus's eyes glow brightly>$B$BDo I devour you whole or do I allow you to live?$B$BPerhaps you could still be of some use...$B$BChallenge my minion, $r. Survive and return proof of your victory to me.
I do not possess any proof, Cyrus.
I present you with proof of my deeds, Cyrus.
I am here!
If it's any consolation, I'll be leaving the cell door open. How you get out is your problem. Good bye, Kharan.
Indeed.
Continue with your story please.
So you suspect that someone on the inside was involved? They were tipped off?
Which would explain why you're sitting in a jail cell at the bottom of a mountain, right, dwarf?
Nothing. My orders were to speak with you and then speak with Thrall. All I know is that Thrall is interested in saving your princess.

<Kharan sighs.>$B$BI suppose... I suppose you are right.$B$BGor'shak told me that your Warchief has big plans. Plans that may change the way the Alliance and Horde interact. What do you know about this?
Because you are still alive and my hands aren't gripped firmly around your stubby little neck.
Do I look stupid to you, $r? I may as well sign her death warrant myself! Why should I trust you?
All is not lost, Kharan!
I am not here to harm you, Kharan. Gor'shak sent me. He told me that you would speak to me about the Princess.
Get it over with you filthy $r.$B$B<Kharan lowers his head, exposing his stubby neck.>
... oops.
Ok!  Let's get started!
HEY! HEY YOU! $R! Get me out of here!
Try and make yourself useful, $r. GET ME OUT OF HERE! The High Interrogator has the key.
Key... get the key... Gerstahn has... key.
Can you tell me how I can get a Videre Elixir?
Buy somethin', will ya?
Greetings!
Launch me!
I'd like to see what you have to sell.
Run for hills! Wait! We already in hills!
$N KILL! $G He:She; kill you now! RUN! RUN!
WHO KILL GOR'TESH!?!? WHO DO THIS?!
RUN! RUN FOR HILLS!
GOR'TESH DEAD?!?!
Oh, if I only had a tree branch to hold up in front of me. The guards would never see me then.
You must be hard up to be wandering these Badlands, $c.  Hard up like me.$B$BOr maybe you're here because you're crazy.  Crazy, like me.
Your reign of terror ends now!  Face your doom mortals!
Great dangers lie beyond those walls, $n. turn back until you are more seasoned in the ways of combat.
So what's this new plague all about?
Watch where you're stepping, $c, because I have a polymorph spell with your name on it...

Yes, but you'll find it more rewarding if you have skill in herbalism!  You will be required to nurture and cultivate special seeds -- not to swing an axe blindly or gesticulate wildly at passing shadows.  While the Evergreen Pouch you'll receive allows even the simplest brute to grow something, those who show some aptitude will have more bountiful results.

You will find Fineous Darkvire beyond the Ring of Law, in the Hall of Crafting. Kill the miserable cur and recover Ironfel.$B$BTake Ironfel to the Shrine of Thaurissan and place the hammer in its rightful place: In the hands of the statue erected in my honor.$B$BWhen this is done, the compartment in which I stored the master key will open. More importantly, Ironfel will remain forever in my grasp. Should they make an attempt to remove the hammer; both the statue and hammer will shatter, lost forever.
Just show me the way, Franclorn.
Fascinating. Please, tell me more.
Amazing! I've never spoken to a ghost. I wish to learn!
What are you doing out here?

Ahoy, $N! Not a pretty picture, is it?$B$BThe Horizon Scout at the bottom of the sea, my crew in shambles, and our cargo and passengers strewn about like so much debris that you'd think this was one of Stormwind's canals after a festival.$B$BAnd that's not where the trouble ends...
Hello, $n.  Welcome to Thelsamar, and while you're here don't forget to visit our local brewery!

Hello, $C.  I hope you've come to bolster our ranks.  Beasts and thieves are spilling into our beloved Elwynn, and we barely have enough men to keep the roads safe!$B$BAnd if you haven't done so, read that notice about Hogger.  He's a beast in yonder woods that must be dealt with.
I lost my transponder and need another one, Scooty.
Of course I offer lessons to other Enchanters, provided you are ready.
Yes, I offer training. But it's not cheap.
Even in peace there is still war, and many clans still fight beneath the banner of the Warchief. Are you here to add your clan to those that fight for Orgrimmar?
Tell me what you want, and make it quick.
Present the trinkets, Maltrake.
Thank you again for helping Hilary, $g mister : miss;!  When I grow up, I wanna be a hero just like you!
Thank you $g mister : miss; for finding my necklace!  You're the best!
Of course I will help!
Unbelievable! How dare they??
Interesting, continue please.
That is tragic. How did this happen?
I am ready, Historian Archesonus.
Greetings, $N. Have you come to learn of the history of Ironforge?
Defiler... you will be punished for this incursion. <A symbol of flame radiates from the relic before it crumbles to the earth.>
Your existence is acknowledged. <The relic turns to dust. Your head throbs with newfound wisdom. Something evil lurks in the heart of the mountain.>
He cannot be defeated. <The relic burns to nothing. The memories it held are now your own. This city was destroyed by a being not of this world.>
Help us, outsider. <The relic crumbles to dust. A vision of eight Dark Iron dwarves performing some sort of ritual fills your head.>
Do not taint these ruins, mortal. <You are engulfed in a blinding flash of light. A creature composed entirely of flame is the only thing you can remember seeing.>
You will perish here. <Your mind fills with visions of chaos and destruction.>
Leave this place. <The relic emits a white hot arc of flame. A memory has been gained: A lone Dark Iron dwarf is surrounded by seven corpses, kneeling before a monolith of flame.>
I wish to face the Defiler.
Thank you.
Guards!
A pleasure, $N. What can I do for you?
The arcane only corrupts those who are weak. Even if you do not follow the path of the warlock, you would do well to remember that.
Captain, here they come! The naga are coming!
Your skills in alchemy aren't yet high enough to benefit from my teachings.  Perhaps if you speak with me later...
Your talents in cooking are a little too low.  Maybe with some practice I can teach you what I know.
Tell me more about these hippogryphs.
Yes.  Give me the spell to summon the avatar.
Sentinels, come to my defense!

Through my studies, I see that defeating the god Hakkar's avatar has weakened him.  But the bulk of his strength remains, lurking at the far end of the Nether.$B$BYou have defeated his avatar once, $N.  Perhaps if you defeat it again you can further weaken the god so that, one day, we might face his true self.$B$BI have prepared a spell that you may use to again summon an avatar of Hakkar within the Sanctum of the Fallen God.  Do you want to confront it once again?
Guardians! Defend Sen'jin!
Grunts! Attack!

Hello there $glad:lass;... the name's Oglethorpe and I may be responsible for one of the amazing gnomish devices you might possess!  If it blew up, then it wasn't me; if it made you rich though, we can discuss royalties!$B$BOh, and if you're from Gnomeregan, you can just take two ninety degree angles, smash them together, and start marching.  I have nothing to say to you.
Access secret gnome engineering schemata!
Greetings!  If you are here to access gnome engineering schemata, please have your gnome engineer membership card ready for verification.
Access secret goblin engineering schemata!
You're an alchemist?  So am I.  Perhaps you can teach me what you know...
Hm... yes, I do have a recipe you might find useful.  Let me teach you!
You can cook?  So can I!  Is there a recipe you can teach me?
Raze follow $N! Raze SMASH poachers! SMASH SMASH SMASH! Tell Raze to SMASH by playing with stick! SMASH!
Can you help me get down?
Feralas - Screecher Spirit - On Quest Default Greeting
What brings you to the Cenarion Circle, $N?
DUMMY SPELL TEST MESSAGE
Who dares?! I will destroy you!
You've done it, $N! <The strangely familiar voice seems to be coming from the phial!> Hurry back! The fallout will only remain stable for thirty minutes.

I am not here because of honor, $N. I am here because of one orc's pride.$B$BIf I had not rejected Belgrom's offers, then I'm sure I'd still be in Orgrimmar taking care of real business.$B$BHis desire for women is not unknown to many of the female warriors in Durotar, but that doesn't stop him from being his charming self.$B$BHe's lucky he didn't pursue his desire for me much longer though--he'd be short more than just the digits on his hands.

Belgrom sent us here from Orgrimmar to aid him in an unwise Alliance, but if his gamble pays off, then it will be to the great benefit of all the Horde.$B$BToo many orcs have already perished because of his desire to please women, but he still commands us, and our honor dictates we make the best of this situation.
Mistress!! They seek to destroy your work!!

Interesting, interesting... I know of a druid that lives atop the hill above the Wailing Caverns, $N. She might be able to tell you more about this shard you have found.$B$BNow, I must get back to work!
Good luck. Sorry I can't take you with me!
I have given you an oathstone of Ysera's Dragonflight, $n.  When you are ready and able to aid us, use it, and then we may begin.
I will consider what you have told me.
I possess part of Eranikus' essence.  What do you want with it... or with me?
What happened to him in the first place?  When I... encountered him, he was rather malicious.
Do you know someone... or something, rather, by the name of Eranikus?
What's an elf like you doing inside a cave like this?
The statues all move back into their original positions.$B$BThe sequence must be started again now, from the beginning.
Reset all of the statues in this room.

I give unto you cordial salutations, $r.  You've come far off the beaten path merely to speak to someone dwelling inside a cave.  I trust there is a reason for your strange, yet not unforeseen visit here.  Yes?
Conjure the Torch of Retribution, Kalaran.
My charge to watch the temple has failed... my corrupted soul knows no peace...
Will the nightmare ever end?!  I cannot force myself awake!
It hurts so much... Itharius, my old friend... please help me...
My soul is not a trinket!  Mortal, you must release me from these chains!
You are an agent of their wicked god, fool.  I will see you destroyed!
Foolish mortal, I will rend your soul in two once I am released!
Torture me no more!  Release me, mortal!  The Swamp of Sorrows... mortal... please...
My eyes!  It burns... it burns...
Soon, the Scourge will rule the world!
We will spread across this barren land!
Let me confer with my colleagues.
Tell me what drives this vengeance?
The statues are all in place, and you may begin the puzzle.
If tailoring is your thing, Vizzklick will most definitely have your supplies. Take a look around, $N, and let me know if you wish to purchase something!
All they be doin' is a little huntin' and gatherin'. Where's the harm in that??
Tell me more about muisek.
I want to begin the statue puzzle.
How could the altar and the statues be related?
Use this Staff of Command on Raze when you are near Shadowsilk Poachers and he will make them rue the day they decided to poach in these lands.
Raze need go home now. Bye, bye, $r.
Let me think about it, Zamael.
Please continue, Zamael.
I wish to hear your tale.
Salutations, Astarii. I require training.
Greetings, $N. May Elune's wisdom guide your hand and heart. How may I help you today?
Guards! Help me!
I know of a druid that lives atop the hill above the Wailing Caverns,$N. She might be able to tell you more about this shard you have found.
Touch the Suntara stone and call forth Lathoric the Black and his guardian, Obsidion.
Obsidion rise and serve your master!
Your task is complete. Prepare to meet your doom.
You have returned to finish the job? <Lathoric laughs.> Obsidion rise and annihilate them!
Excellent, fresh blood has arrived.
You will make a fitting sacrifice to Ragnaros.
You dare interrupt our prayer? Execute them!
Infidels!
I've been here long enough, $N. I'm sure we'll meet again. Good luck!
Aye, it's a cold one today, but ne'er too cold to offer you my fine wares!
In the pipe, 5 by 5!
GOOOOOOOAAAAAAAALLLLLLLLLLL!
Swish!  We are on fire today boys.
He puts the rock into the hole!
It's up and....it's good!
From way downtown!
He shoots, he scores!
It's in the hole!  It's in the hole!
This is the place, $r: The Cauldron! Mark it on a map or do something so that you don't forget. If anything ever happened to me, my team would be stuck in that mine forever.
Are you going to let an injured dwarf do all the work for you?
You are well on your way, $N.  But you still have much to learn.  The southern Barrens may be where your next lesson is found.
Where does my path now lead, Jorn?
The secrets of Suntara will not leave these lands.
What can I do at an inn?
Done, done, and done.
My apologies, Pebblebitty.
Absolutely!
Orcs? Badlands? I'm invulnerable!
Another way? Do tell...
What's the worst that could happen?
Finding Reethe.
The Burning Inn.
I wish to hear your story.
Yes.
I will do this with or without your help, Loramus.

Their minds are now tainted, $r. Yes, even more so than before. They live only to serve and protect Razelikh. The amulet fragments they each hold are the key to summoning the demon lord. What you do not understand is that none of them can be harmed through any conventional means
I do not understand.
Will you help?
Hail, Loramus. I bring word from the Blasted Lands.
What have you heard of the Shady Rest Inn?
Death is merely a doorway to rebirth. The brood shall rise again.
The servants of sul will feast on your remains.
Succumb to the gaze, mortals!
There is no escape!
Never shall you find the twin blades of Sul.
Did you hear something?
Be healed, my pets!
Skulls you will give and skulls I will take.
Tell me more, Trenton.
The muisek vessels are now ready, $N.

Incredible power can be found in the spirits or "muisek" of the creatures that we battle against.$B$BLook inside yourself; learn to harness the power of your own spirit, and you will be more powerful than you ever imagined.
I'm glad the commotions died down some around here. The last thing this place needs is another brawl.
Access: Discombobulator Ray
That's it!  I'm tired of helping you out.  It's time we settled things on the battlefield!
Stand guard -- intruders are near.
Sir?
Now, watch...
Death to you, $n. How dare you come within a bow's shot of me!
Quickly! $N attacks!
I am ready to begin.
No! The faerie dragons aren't making it, $N! I must return to Jer'kai to make sure she hasn't been found. Elune be with you.
Your discs will be returned to you once you access the pedestal.
I will return when I have the Plates of Uldum.
So... what's inside Uldum?
Excuse me?  We've been "rescheduled for visitation"?  What does that mean?!
Where are the Plates of Uldum?
What are the Plates of Uldum?
What function do you serve?
Salutations!  I am a guardian of entry.  Please use the proper discs for access to Uldum.
Primary interaction complete.  Image dissipation in ten minutes.
Yeah! They made it! The captured sprite darters made it!
Aw! The captured sprite darters didn't make it. What will we do?

Please, a moment, $N. Kindal is down below in the Grimtotem camp trying to free the faerie dragons from captivity. We were just lucky that help came along when it did. Who knows what those foul tauren would have done to them.
Straight from the lush forests of Elwynn, get your fresh fruit right here.
Sink your teeth into a fresh, ripe apple.
Come get yer fresh bread!
Fresh bread, baked this very morning.
Access: Minor Recombobulator

Hah! Serves you right, you filthy trogg!!
Not one word....
Here goes nothing!
